data.name: 贤者谏言合集
entries: 《贤者指南汇编》汇集了有关《龙与地下城》（第五版）规则的问题和答案。当文本进行了实质性的增补或修订时，该文件的版本号会发生变化。

《怪物图鉴》（简称MM）
{@book 主宰者指南|DMG}（简称DMG）

entries.name: 官方裁决
entries.ENG_name: Official Rulings
entries: 官方对于规则的解释在这里的{@i Sage Advice Compendium}中给出，由游戏的首席规则设计师Jeremy Crawford撰写（在Twitter上可以找到他{@link @JeremyECrawford}）。
D&D团队或{@link 威世智海岸公司|https://dnd.wizards.com}的其他人的公开声明不是官方裁决；它们是建议。Jeremy Crawford的推文经常是这里将出现的裁决的预览。
地牢主负责裁决游戏，并决定是否在游戏中使用官方规则。在规则问题上，DM拥有最终决定权。

entries.name: 汇编答案
entries.ENG_name: Compiled Answers
entries: 这里汇编了与当前规则状态相关的贤者建议答案。

entries.name: 规则的作用
entries.ENG_name: The Role of Rules

entries.name: 即使地牢主可以直接作出裁决，为什么还要有像《贤者建议》这样的栏目呢？
entries.ENG_name: Why even have a column like Sage Advice when a DM can just make a ruling?
entries: 规则是使D&D成为游戏而不仅仅是即兴讲故事的重要组成部分。
游戏的规则旨在帮助组织，甚至激发，D&D战役的行动。规则是一种工具，我们希望我们的工具尽可能有效。无论这些工具有多好，它们都需要一群玩家来赋予它们生命，以及一个DM来指导它们的使用。
地牢主是关键。在D&D战役中，可能会发生许多意想不到的事情，没有一套规则能够合理地考虑到每一种可能性。如果规则试图做到这一点，游戏将变得无法进行。另一种选择是让规则严格限制角色可以做的事情，这将与D&D的开放性背道而驰。我们为当前版本选择的方向是奠定一套规则基础，地牢主可以在此基础上进行构建，我们接受了地牢主作为规则所涉及事项与规则未涉及事项之间的桥梁的角色。
在典型的D&D游戏中，DM会做出许多规则决定——有些几乎不引人注意，有些则相当明显。玩家也解释规则，整个团队保持游戏的运行。然而，有时一个规则的设计意图不明确，或者一个规则似乎与另一个规则相矛盾。
处理这些情况是{@i 贤者建议}的用武之地。这个栏目不会取代地下城主的裁决。就像规则一样，这个栏目旨在为地下城主和玩家提供调整游戏以适应他们口味的工具。该栏目还应该揭示一些视角，帮助您以新的视角看待游戏的一部分，并帮助您微调您的D&D体验。
当我回答规则问题时，我通常会从一到三个不同的角度来考虑它们。

entries.name: 原始
entries.ENG_name: RAW
entries: "规则即文本"——这就是RAW所代表的意思。当我深入研究规则的RAW解释时，我是在研究文本在上下文中所说的内容，不考虑设计者的意图。文本被迫独立存在。
每当我考虑一个规则时，我总是从这个角度出发；对我来说，重要的是看到你们所看到的，而不是我希望我们发布的内容或认为我们发布的内容。

entries.name: 莱
entries.ENG_name: RAI
entries: {@note ("Rules as Intended.")} 你们中的一些人特别感兴趣的是了解规则背后的意图。这就是RAI（按预期的规则）的用武之地："按预期的规则。"这种方法是关于设计者在编写某些内容时的意图。在一个完美的世界中，规则即文字（RAW）和RAI完全一致，但有时页面上的文字并不能成功传达设计者的意图。或者，也许这些文字对一组玩家有效，但对另一组则无效。
当我撰写关于某一规则的RAI解释时，我将揭开帷幕，告诉你当我们撰写某个特定规则时，D&D团队的意图是什么。

entries.name: 皇家空军
entries.ENG_name: RAF
entries: {@note ("规则的乐趣.")} 不管页面上写了什么或者设计师的初衷是什么，D&D的目的是好玩，而地牢主是每个游戏桌上的主持人。最好的地牢主会即时调整游戏，以给玩家带来最大的乐趣。这样的地牢主追求的是RAF，即“规则的乐趣”。我们期望地牢主在运行特定战役或寻求特定玩家群体的最大幸福时，能够偏离规则。有时我的规则答案会包括如何为你们团队实现规则的RAF解释的建议。
我推荐健康地混合使用RAW、RAI和RAF！

entries.name: 角色创建
entries.ENG_name: Character Creation

entries.name: 如何计算生物的护甲等级（AC）？
entries.ENG_name: How do you calculate a creature's Armor Class (AC)?
entries: 《玩家手册》中的{@book 第1章|PHB|1|护甲等级}描述了如何确定AC，然而AC的计算经常引发问题。考虑到游戏中有如此多的方法可以改变你的AC，这个事实并不令人惊讶！以下是一些计算你基础AC的方法：

entries.name: 未穿戴护甲
entries.ENG_name: Unarmored
entries: 10加上你的敏捷修正值。

entries.name: 装甲的
entries.ENG_name: Armored
entries: 使用你穿着的盔甲的护甲等级（AC）条目（见PHB，"{@book 盔甲与盾牌|PHB|5|盔甲与盾牌}"）。例如，在皮甲中，你计算你的AC为11加上你的敏捷修正值，而在锁子甲中，你的AC仅仅是16。

entries.name: 未装甲防御（野蛮人）
entries.ENG_name: Unarmored Defense (Barbarian)
entries: 10 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的体质调整值。

entries.name: 无甲防御（武僧）
entries.ENG_name: Unarmored Defense (Monk)
entries: 10 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的智慧调整值。

entries.name: 龙族韧性（术士）
entries.ENG_name: Draconic Resilience (Sorcerer)
entries: 13加上你的敏捷修正值。

entries.name: 天生护甲
entries.ENG_name: Natural Armor
entries: 10 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的自然装甲加值。这是一种通常只由怪物和NPC使用的计算方法，尽管它也适用于变身为具有自然装甲形态的德鲁伊或其他角色。
这些方法——以及任何其他提供计算你AC（护甲等级）公式的方法——是相互排斥的；你一次只能从它们中受益一个。如果你有多个可使用的方法，你可以选择使用哪一个。例如，如果你是一个巫师/武僧，你可以选择使用无甲防御或龙族韧性，不能两者兼得。同样，一个变形为具有天然护甲的野兽形态的德鲁伊/野蛮人可以选择使用野兽的天然护甲或无甲防御（使用天然护甲时，你不被认为是穿戴护甲）。
盾牌呢？当你使用盾牌时，它会使你的基础AC增加2点。例如，如果你未穿戴盔甲并使用盾牌，你的AC是12加上你的敏捷修正值。请注意，某些AC计算，比如武僧的无甲防御，禁止使用盾牌。

Once you have your base AC, it can be temporarily modified by situational bonuses and penalties. For instance, having half cover gives you a +2 bonus to your AC, and three-quarters cover gives a +5 bonus. Spells sometimes modify AC as well. {@spell 虔诚护盾}, for example, grants a target a +2 bonus to AC until the spell ends.
魔法物品也可以增强你的AC。以下是一些例子：{@item +1锁子甲}让你的AC达到17，一个{@item 保护戒指}无论你穿什么都会给予你+1的AC加成，而{@item 防御护腕}如果你没有穿盔甲或使用盾牌，会给予你+2的AC加成。

entries.name: 种族特质
entries.ENG_name: Racial Traits

entries.name: 精灵的冥想特性允许他们在4小时内完成一次长时间的休息吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Trance trait allow an elf to finish a long rest in 4 hours?
entries: 如果一个精灵在长时间休息期间冥想（如恍惚特性中描述的），那么精灵只需4小时即可完成休息。冥想中的精灵除此之外遵循所有长时间休息的规则；只有持续时间发生了变化。

entries.name: 轻足半身人和森林精灵的隐藏种族特性允许他们在被观察时隐藏吗？
entries.ENG_name: Do the lightfoot halfling and wood elf hiding racial traits allow them to hide while observed?
entries: The lightfoot halfling and wood elf traits—Naturally Stealthy and Mask of the Wild—do allow members of those subraces to try to hide in their special circumstances even when observers are nearby. Normally, you can't hide from someone if you're in full view. A lightfoot halfling, though, can try to vanish behind a creature that is at least one size larger, and a wood elf can try to hide simply by being in heavy rain, mist, falling snow, foliage, or similar natural phenomena. It's as if nature itself cloaks a wood elf from prying eyes—even eyes staring right at the elf! Both subraces are capable of hiding in situations when most other creatures can't, but neither subrace's hiding attempt is assured of success; a Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) check is required as normal, and an observant foe might later spot a hidden halfling or elf: "I see you behind that guard, you tricksy halfling!"

entries.name: 一个拥有龙族血统的龙裔术士是否可以拥有两种不同的龙族祖先血统？
entries.ENG_name: Can a dragonborn sorcerer with a draconic bloodline have two different kinds of Draconic Ancestry?
entries: 龙裔巫师可以选择不同的祖先来确定种族特性和龙族祖先特性。你对种族特性的选择是你的实际祖先，而对职业特性的选择可能是象征性的祖先——赋予你或你家族魔法的龙的类型，或者是充满魔法能量的龙族神器或地点的种类。

entries.name: 变形者的临时生命值持续多长时间？
entries.ENG_name: How long do a shifter's temporary hit points last?
entries: 除非特性另有说明，临时生命值将持续到你完成一次长时间的休息（{@book PHB, 198|PHB|9|临时生命值}）。

entries.name: 并非所有的魔法黑暗都能阻挡黑暗视觉。
entries.ENG_name: Does all magical darkness block darkvision?
entries: Magical darkness blocks {@sense 黑暗视觉} only if the rules text for a particular instance of darkness says it does. For example, the darkness spell specifies that it produces a magical darkness that obstructs {@sense 黑暗视觉}. That obstruction is a feature of the spell, not of magical darkness in general.

entries.name: 兼职:职业特性
entries.ENG_name: Class Features

entries.name: 当你使用额外攻击时，你必须用同一把武器进行所有攻击吗？
entries.ENG_name: When you use Extra Attack, do you have to use the same weapon for all the attacks?
entries: 额外攻击特性对攻击方式没有任何限制。你可以使用常规武器、临时武器、徒手攻击，或者这些选项的组合来进行攻击。

entries.name: 奇械师
entries.ENG_name: Artificer

entries.name: Flash of Genius 的时机是什么？
entries.ENG_name: What is the timing of Flash of Genius?
entries: You use Flash of Genius immediately after the triggering {@dice d20} is rolled and before any of the effects of the roll are applied. Unless a rule tells you otherwise, a reaction occurs immediately after its trigger.

entries.name: 激活法术储存物品使用的是哪个动作？
entries.ENG_name: Which action is used to activate a Spell-Storing Item?
entries: 激活一个法术储存物品使用“使用物品”动作。

entries.name: 术士可以提前解除他们对物品的注入效果吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can an artificer dismiss one of their infusions on an object early?
entries: 不是的。注入魔法的持续时间直到《注入物品》特性中“注入物品”部分描述的情况之一发生。

entries.name: 野蛮人
entries.ENG_name: Barbarian

entries.name: 野蛮人的危机感知能力是否对呼吸武器和敌人的特殊能力有效？
entries.ENG_name: Does the barbarian's Danger Sense work against breath weapons and enemies' special abilities?
entries: 野蛮人的危机感知能力有助于对抗野蛮人能看到的任何效果的敏捷豁免投掷。

entries.name: 对于野蛮人的鲁莽攻击，你是否给予所有敌人优势，还是只针对你的攻击目标？
entries.ENG_name: For the barbarian's Reckless Attack, do you grant advantage to all enemies, or only to the target of your attack?
entries: 如果你使用野蛮人的鲁莽攻击，直到你的下个回合开始前，所有的攻击检定对你都有优势。

entries.name: 吟游诗人
entries.ENG_name: Bard

entries.name: 吟游诗人的灵感和引导法术的效果可以叠加吗？它们可以应用于同一掷骰吗？
entries.ENG_name: Do the benefits from Bardic Inspiration and the guidance spell stack? Can they be applied to the same roll?
entries: Yes, different effects stack if they don't have the same name. If a creature makes an ability check while it is under the effect of a {@spell 神导术} spell and also has a Bardic Inspiration die, it can roll both a {@dice d4} and a {@dice d6} if it so chooses.

entries.name: Is the intent that a bard gets to know the number rolled on an attack roll or ability check before using Cutting Words, or should they always guess? If used on a damage roll, does Cutting Words apply to any kind of damage roll including an auto-hit spell like {@spell 魔法飞弹}?
entries.ENG_name: Is the intent that a bard gets to know the number rolled on an attack roll or ability check before using Cutting Words, or should they always guess? If used on a damage roll, does Cutting Words apply to any kind of damage roll including an auto-hit spell like {@spell magic missile}?
entries: You can wait to use Cutting Words after the roll, but you must commit to doing so before you know for sure whether the total of the roll or check is a success or a failure. You can use Cutting Words to reduce the damage from any effect that calls for a damage roll (including {@spell 魔法飞弹}) even if the damage roll is not preceded by an attack roll.

entries.name: 诗人可以通过魔法秘密获得的法术进行替换吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a bard replace spells gained through Magical Secrets?
entries: 当你在吟游诗人职业中提升等级时，该职业的施法特性允许你用另一个适当等级的吟游诗人法术替换你所知道的一个吟游诗人法术。通过你的魔法秘密特性学到的法术对你来说算作吟游诗人法术，所以在以后提升吟游诗人等级时可以被替换。但根据施法特性中的规则，它必须被吟游诗人法术替换。

entries.name: 诗人可以理解哪些法术卷轴——仅来自诗人法术列表的法术，还是来自诗人法术列表加上魔法秘密中的法术？
entries.ENG_name: Which spell scrolls can bards understand—spells from the bard list only, or spells from the bard list plus spells from Magical Secrets?
entries: 一个吟游诗人可以使用任何上面有吟游诗人法术的{@item 法术卷轴}——包括从魔法秘密特性获得的法术，这些法术对那个角色来说被视为吟游诗人法术。

entries.name: 使用英勇学院的战斗灵感增加的攻击伤害是否算作关键命中时的伤害骰？
entries.ENG_name: Does using College of Valor's Combat Inspiration add to the damage of an attack count as a damage die for purposes of critical hits?
entries: 是的。

entries.name: 牧师
entries.ENG_name: Cleric

entries.name: 当牧师使用毁灭之怒特性时，只要其中一些是闪电或雷鸣伤害，它是否会使所有滚动的伤害最大化？
entries.ENG_name: When a cleric uses the Destructive Wrath feature, does it maximize all damage getting rolled, as long as some of it is lightning or thunder?
entries: {@class 牧师||毁灭之怒|风暴}旨在仅最大化闪电和雷鸣伤害。

entries.name: 如果一个墓地领域牧师施放了一个法术，该法术为多个生物恢复生命值，并且其中一个生物的生命值为0，那么这个法术是否为法术的所有目标恢复最大数量的生命值？
entries.ENG_name: If a Grave Domain cleric casts a spell that restores hit points to multiple creatures and one of those creatures has 0 hit points, does the spell restore the maximum number of hit points to all targets of the spell?
entries: 不。只有生命值降至0点的生物才能从死亡之环特性的生命值恢复部分获益。

entries.name: 德鲁伊
entries.ENG_name: Druid

entries.name: 如果一个德鲁伊穿戴金属盔甲会发生什么？
entries.ENG_name: What happens if a druid wears metal armor?
entries: 德鲁伊爆炸了。

嗯，实际上并非如此。德鲁伊有一个禁忌，那就是不穿戴金属盔甲和不使用金属盾牌。这个禁忌自从德鲁伊职业首次出现在《Eldritch Wizardry》（1976年）和最初的《Player's Handbook》（1978年）中以来，一直是这个职业故事的一部分。这个观点是，德鲁伊更愿意由动物皮、木头和其他与文明无关的天然材料来保护。德鲁伊并不是缺乏穿戴金属盔甲的能力。他们选择不穿它。这个选择是他们作为神秘秩序一部分的身份。这样想吧：素食者可以吃肉类，但他们选择不吃。

德鲁伊通常穿着{@item 皮甲|PHB|leather}、{@item 钉甲|PHB|studded leather}或{@item 皮甲|PHB|hide}。如果德鲁伊找到了非金属制成的{@item 鳞甲|PHB|scale mail}，他可能会穿着它。如果你强烈希望让你的德鲁伊打破禁忌，穿上金属甲，和你的地牢主谈谈。在D&D中，每个职业都有故事元素与其游戏特性相结合；这两种设计类型在D&D中是相辅相成的，某些职业的故事元素比其他职业更强。德鲁伊和圣武士在其设计中尤其有强烈的故事元素。如果你想偏离你职业的故事，你的地牢主有最终决定权，决定你可以走多远，仍然被认为是该职业的成员。只要你遵守你角色的熟练度，你不会破坏游戏系统的任何东西，但你可能破坏了你的战役中正在创造的故事和世界。

entries.name: 一个被绑且被塞住嘴巴的德鲁伊能否简单地使用野性变身来逃脱？很难抓住一个可以随意变成老鼠的人。
entries.ENG_name: Can a bound and gagged druid simply use Wild Shape to get out? It's hard to capture someone who can turn into a mouse at will
entries: 变成不同大小可能是逃脱的有效方式，这取决于束缚或限制的性质。综合考虑，试图囚禁德鲁伊的人可能明智地将囚犯藏在一个只有空气能进入的开口的房间中。

entries.name: 德鲁伊的元素野性形态是否限制你只能变成列出的四种生物，还是你可以变成任何具有元素类型的生物？
entries.ENG_name: Does the druid's Elemental Wild Shape limit you to the four creatures listed, or can you turn into any creature with the elemental type?
entries: 在《元素野性变身》中列出的生物——{@creature 空气元素||空气}、{@creature 土元素||土}、{@creature 火元素||火}和{@creature 水元素||水}元素——是《怪物手册|MM}中的特定生物，而不是生物类型或子类型。元素野性变身允许你变身为这些生物之一。

entries.name: 一个月亮之环德鲁伊在变成元素形态时能否说它知道的语言？
entries.ENG_name: Can a Circle of the Moon druid speak the languages it knows while in the form of an elemental?
entries: 是的，因为《元素野性变身》中列出的元素生物能够说话。
从字面解释（RAW）野性变身可能会合理地让你认为变身后的德鲁伊只能说出元素生物统计块中出现的那些语言，但意图（RAI）是德鲁伊在变身时保留他们的知识，包括语言知识，并且如果采取的形态能够说话，他们可以说出他们知道的语言。

entries.name: 如果德鲁伊在元素形态下可以说话，那么德鲁伊能否施放法术？
entries.ENG_name: If a druid in elemental form can speak, can the druid cast spells?
entries: 德鲁伊只有在达到18级并获得野性野兽法术特性时，才能在野性变身形态中施放法术。

entries.name: 如果德鲁伊选择了魔法先驱特性并选择侦测魔法作为他们的一个法术，德鲁伊能否将该法术作为仪式法术施放？
entries.ENG_name: If a druid takes the Magic Initiate feat and chooses detect magic as their one spell, can the druid cast that spell as a ritual?
entries: 德鲁伊的仪式施法需要准备仪式。从魔法启蒙获得的法术是已知的，但未准备。

entries.name: 战士
entries.ENG_name: Fighter

entries.name: 战士的行动激增特性是否允许你获得额外的奖励行动，除了额外的动作之外？
entries.ENG_name: Does the fighter's Action Surge feature let you take an extra bonus action, in addition to an extra action?
entries: 行动激增给你一个额外的动作，而不是额外的奖励动作。（《玩家手册》（PHB）最近的印刷版本不再包含引发这个问题的措辞。）

entries.name: 战士能否同时激活两种战斗风格？
entries.ENG_name: Can a fighter have two fighting styles active at once?
entries: 例如决斗和防御。只要它们没有冲突的要求，你可以同时从多个战斗风格选项中受益，就像决斗和重武器战斗那样。

entries.name: 弓箭战斗风格是否适用于你投掷的近战武器？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Archery fighting style work with a melee weapon that you throw?
entries: 不，箭术特性仅对远程武器有益。像{@item 匕首|PHB}或{@item 手斧|PHB}这样的近战武器，当你用它进行{@book 远程攻击|PHB|9|Ranged Attacks}时，仍然是近战武器。

entries.name: 决斗战斗风格是否旨在支持使用盾牌？
entries.ENG_name: Is the Dueling fighting style intended to support a shield?
entries: 是的。选择决斗战斗风格的人物通常会将一把单手武器与一个{@item 盾牌|PHB}、施法焦点或空闲的手配对使用。

entries.name: 如果你使用巨武战斗特性与神圣打击或像诅咒这样的法术一起使用，你是否可以重掷任何额外伤害的1或2点？
entries.ENG_name: If you use Great Weapon Fighting with a feature like Divine Smite or a spell like hex, do you get to reroll any 1 or 2 you roll for the extra damage?
entries: The Great Weapon Fighting feature—which is shared by fighters and paladins—is meant to benefit only the damage roll of the weapon used with the feature. For example, if you use a {@item greatsword|PHB} with the feature, you can reroll any 1 or 2 you roll on the weapon's {@dice 2d6}. If you're a paladin and use Divine Smite with the greatsword, Great Weapon Fighting doesn't let you reroll a 1 or 2 that you roll for the damage of Divine Smite.

entries.name: 如果我的战斗大师战士挑衅了一次机会攻击，并且它未命中，我可以使用反击吗？
entries.ENG_name: If my Battle Master fighter provokes an opportunity attack and it misses, can I use Riposte?
entries: 是的，你可以使用{@class 战士||反击|战斗大师}的策略来回应一个{@book 未命中你的偷袭|PHB|9|偷袭攻击}，假设你的{@book 反应|PHB|9|反应}是可用的。

entries.name: “当”在奥术骑士的战争魔法特性中意味着额外的攻击是在施放戏法之后进行，还是说它可以在之前？
entries.ENG_name: Does the "when" in the Eldritch Knight's War Magic feature mean the bonus attack comes after you cast the cantrip, or can it come before?
entries: 额外行动发生在法术之后，因为使用你的行动来施放法术是你能够以额外行动进行武器攻击的原因。也就是说，如果允许奥秘骑士颠倒法术和武器攻击的顺序，DM不会破坏任何系统规则。

entries.name: 如果我的幽影骑士施放了真视术并且拥有战魔法特性，战魔法提供的攻击是否因为真视术而获得优势？
entries.ENG_name: If my Eldritch Knight casts true strike and has the War Magic feature, is the attack granted by War Magic made with advantage because of true strike?
entries: No. The attack from War Magic is made normally, and you get the benefit of {@spell 克敌机先} on your next turn if the spell hasn't ended.

entries.name: Can the Disarming {@action 攻击} maneuver disarm a creature of a shield it has donned?
entries.ENG_name: Can the Disarming {@action Attack} maneuver disarm a creature of a shield it has donned?
entries: No. Disarming {@action 攻击} forces a creature to drop an object it is holding. Donned shields aren't merely held.

entries.name: 武僧
entries.ENG_name: Monk

entries.name: 如果一个武僧双手使用法杖或其他多功能武器，它是否仍然算作武僧武器？
entries.ENG_name: If a monk uses a staff or another versatile weapon two-handed, does it still count as a monk weapon?
entries: 是的。武僧武器必须不具备双手特性，但没有什么能阻止武僧用双手挥舞这样的武器。从根本上说，无论武僧如何使用它，武僧武器都被视为武僧武器。

entries.name: 飞镖并没有被归类为武僧武器，然而武僧的起始装备中有10根飞镖。这是为什么？
entries.ENG_name: The dart is not classified as a monk weapon, yet a monk gets 10 darts as starting equipment. Why is that?
entries: 起始装备通常为角色提供多功能性。在这种情况下，武僧的{@item 飞镖|PHB|darts}提供了远程攻击选项，而不是武术选项。

entries.name: 武术特性是否将武僧的武器和徒手攻击转变为灵巧武器？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Martial Arts feature turn monk weapons and unarmed strikes into finesse weapons?
entries: 不。这项特性提供了类似于灵巧属性的好处，但特性本身并不赋予该属性。

entries.name: 当使用偏转飞弹的武僧接住并投掷一个抛射物时，攻击的伤害是多少？
entries.ENG_name: When a monk using Deflect Missiles catches and throws a projectile, what is the damage of the attack?
entries: 如果使用偏转飞弹技能投掷，导弹被视为武僧武器；它造成其自身的伤害或武术伤害（武僧选择）。

entries.name: 武僧能否使用震撼一击与徒手攻击，即使徒手攻击不是武器？
entries.ENG_name: Can a monk use Stunning Strike with an unarmed strike, even though unarmed strikes aren't weapons?
entries: 是的。震撼一击与近战武器攻击一起使用，而徒手攻击是近战武器攻击的一种特殊类型。
游戏经常对一般规则做出例外，这是一个重要例外：徒手攻击尽管不是武器，但被视为近战武器攻击。

entries.name: 当武僧使用空灵体时，攻击后隐形效果是否仍然有效？
entries.ENG_name: When a monk uses Empty Body, does the invisibility remain in effect after the monk attacks?
entries: Yes. The {@condition 隐形|phb|invisibility} of the monk's Empty Body isn't ended by the monk attacking.

entries.name: 武僧的纯净之体特性是否赋予对毒素伤害的免疫，中毒状态的免疫，还是两者都有？
entries.ENG_name: Does a monk's Purity of Body feature grant immunity to poison damage, the poisoned condition, or both?
entries: That feature grants immunity to both. As a result, a monk with Purity of Body can, for example, inhale a {@creature Young Green Dragon||green dragon's} poison breath unharmed. Similarly, the monk is unaffected by {@spell 致病射线}, which both deals poison damage and imposes the {@condition 中毒} condition.

entries.name: 武僧的开掌技巧能否推动大型或更大的生物，或者将其击倒？
entries.ENG_name: Can the monk's Open Hand Technique push a Large or larger creature or knock it prone?
entries: 开放手掌技巧有意忽略生物的体型。武僧的气可以激发许多非凡的效果！如果一个特性受到生物体型的限制，特性会告诉你。

entries.name: 武僧需要花费任何气点来施放由影艺特性赋予的次级幻象戏法吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does a monk need to spend any ki points to cast the minor illusion cantrip granted by the Shadow Arts feature?
entries: 不。特性中的气点消耗仅适用于其中的其他法术。

entries.name: 对于影之途武僧，他们的沉默能力可以被解除吗？
entries.ENG_name: For a Way of Shadow monk, can their silence be dispelled?
entries: 法术就是法术，不管它的来源如何。当你通过特性施放法术时，法术受到正常的{@book 施法|PHB|-1}规则的约束，除非特性另有说明。

entries.name: 四元素之道的武僧能否用另一种元素纪律替换元素协调？
entries.ENG_name: Can a monk of the Way of the Four Elements replace Elemental Attunement with another elemental discipline?
entries: 是的。即使你自动知道元素协调，无需选择它，你仍然可以在6级、11级或17级时将其交换为不同的学派。

entries.name: 圣武士
entries.ENG_name: Paladin

entries.name: 圣武士的神圣感知会因为提夫林的地狱血统而将其标记出来吗？
entries.ENG_name: Would a Paladin's Divine Sense register a tiefling due to their infernal heritage?
entries: 提夫林（{@race tiefling}）是一种类人生物，而不是恶魔，因此它不会被神圣感知（Divine Sense）察觉。这项特性可以检测到具有天界、恶魔或亡灵生物类型的生物。

entries.name: 我的圣武士可以使用毁灭法术和神圣打击吗？比如，我施放愤怒毁灭，命中，然后在同一次攻击上使用神圣打击？
entries.ENG_name: Can my paladin use a smite spell along with Divine Smite? As in, I cast wrathful smite, hit, then use Divine Smite on the same attack?
entries: Yes, you can use Divine Smite on the same weapon attack that benefits from a smite spell, such as {@spell 激愤斩}—as long as the attack you make after casting the smite spell is a melee weapon attack. Divine Smite doesn't work with any other kind of attack.

entries.name: 圣武士在使用徒手攻击命中时可以使用神圣打击吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a paladin use Divine Smite when they hit using an unarmed strike?
entries: 不。神圣打击需要使用武器进行近战攻击。规则不认为徒手攻击是武器。
神圣打击确实可以与近战武器攻击一起使用，徒手攻击可以用来进行此类攻击。但是神圣打击的文本也提到了“武器的伤害”，而徒手攻击并不是武器。
如果地下城主决定覆盖这条规则，不会产生不平衡。将神圣打击与武器绑定是我们在主题上的选择——圣武士传统上与武器相关联。这不是一个游戏平衡的选择。

entries.name: 游侠
entries.ENG_name: Ranger

entries.name: 游侠的起始装备中没有组件袋选项。这个职业不需要组件袋，也不需要施法焦点吗？
entries.ENG_name: There is no component pouch option in the ranger's starting equipment. Does the class not need one, nor a focus for spells?
entries: 像其他施法者一样，游侠遵循《玩家手册》第10章中关于{@book 施法材料|PHB|10|Components}的规则。游侠通常使用施法材料包来存放法术的材质材料，但起始时没有材料包，因为游侠在1级时没有法术。

entries.name: 游侠能否在旋风攻击特性的攻击卷中移动？
entries.ENG_name: Can a ranger move between the attack rolls of the Whirlwind Attack feature?
entries: 不。旋风攻击是不寻常的，因为它是一次攻击，但有多个攻击骰。在大多数其他情况下，一次攻击只有一个攻击骰。在攻击之间移动的规则（{@i PHB}, "{@book 在攻击之间移动|PHB|9|在攻击之间移动}"）允许你在武器攻击之间移动，而不是在像旋风攻击这样的特殊特性的攻击骰之间移动。

entries.name: 怪物杀手游侠的超自然防御特性是否适用于当生物对游侠造成伤害，导致游侠进行体质豁免检定以维持对法术的专注时？
entries.ENG_name: Does a Monster Slayer ranger's Supernatural Defense feature apply if a creature damages the ranger, thus causing the ranger to make a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell?
entries: 是的。

entries.name: 游荡者
entries.ENG_name: Rogue

entries.name: 盗贼能否在一轮中使用多次偷袭攻击？
entries.ENG_name: Can a rogue use Sneak Attack more than once per round?
entries: 偷袭攻击的描述指定你每个回合可以使用该特性一次，但它并不限制在你的回合。该特性也没有限制你在一轮中可以使用它的次数。
有时，你有机会在别人的回合上使用偷袭攻击。最常见的情况是当敌人引发了你的机会攻击。如果满足偷袭攻击的要求，你的机会攻击可以从这个特性中受益。类似地，战士可以使用指挥官攻击将在你的回合上授予你攻击机会，如果攻击符合条件，它可以使用偷袭攻击。这两个选项都依赖于使用你的{@book 反应|PHB|9|Reactions}，所以你在一轮中只能做其中之一。
因为你每轮只能使用一次{@book 反应|PHB|9|Reactions}，所以你不太可能在一轮中使用两次以上的偷袭攻击：一次用你的行动，一次用你的反应。

entries.name: 对于偷袭攻击，如果你的目标的另一个敌人手持长兵器（长兵器的攻击范围为10英尺），而不是5英尺远，你还能使用偷袭攻击吗？
entries.ENG_name: For Sneak Attack, what if another enemy of your target was 10 feet away with a polearm (which has a reach of 10 feet), instead of 5 feet away? Would you still be able to use Sneak Attack?
entries: 偷袭攻击中的5英尺限制不受武器射程的影响。那个目标的其他敌人正在制造近距离干扰，无论手中拿着什么武器。

entries.name: 灵巧闪避是否自动对流氓或游侠被击中的每一次攻击都有效？法术攻击也算吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does Uncanny Dodge work automatically against every attack a rogue or ranger gets hit by? Spell attacks too?
entries: A use of Uncanny Dodge works against only one attack, since it expends your {@book reaction|PHB|9|Reactions}, and only if you can see the attacker. It works against attacks of all sorts, including spell attacks, but it is no help against a spell or other effect, such as {@spell 火球术}, that delivers its damage after a saving throw rather than after an attack roll.

entries.name: 如果一个盗贼被{@quickref 突袭|PHB|3|0|突袭}，他们可以使用回避吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a rogue use Evasion if they are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}?
entries: 规则说明如果你被{@quickref 突袭|PHB|3|0|突袭}，你不能移动或采取行动。一个被{@quickref 突袭|PHB|3|0|突袭}的盗贼可以使用回避，因为那个特性不要求盗贼采取行动或移动。

entries.name: 流氓的可靠才能特性能否与非凡运动员或万事通一起使用？
entries.ENG_name: Can the rogue's Reliable Talent feature be used in conjunction with Remarkable Athlete or Jack of All Trades?
entries: 不。这些特性各自有一个使用前提条件；可靠才能在进行使用你的熟练加值的能力检定时激活，而其他两个特性在进行不使用你的熟练加值的能力检定时激活。换句话说，符合可靠才能特性的条件的检定不符合非凡运动员或万事通的特性条件。并且，非凡运动员和万事通不能同时使用，因为你只能一次将你的熟练加值，或其任何部分，加到一次掷骰上。

entries.name: 盗贼能否使用巧手特性来激活魔法物品？
entries.ENG_name: Can a thief use the Fast Hands feature to activate a magic item?
entries: No. One of the benefits of Fast Hands is being able to take the {@action 使用物件} action as a bonus action, but using a magic item doesn't fall under Use an Object, as explained in the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG} (see "{@book Activating an Item|DMG|7|Activating an Item}"). In contrast, using a nonmagical item, such as a {@item healer's kit|PHB}, is in the domain of {@action 使用物件}.

entries.name: 对于触发盗贼的暗杀能力，生物何时不再处于{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|突袭}状态？是在他们回合结束后，还是在回合结束时？
entries.ENG_name: For triggering the rogue's Assassinate ability, when does a creature stop being {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}? After their turn in the round, or at the end of the round?
entries: 一个{quickref 惊讶|PHB|3|0|surprised}生物在战斗的第一个回合结束时不再{quickref 惊讶|PHB|3|0|surprised}。

entries.name: 盗贼的“使用魔法装置”特性是否允许他们使用法术卷轴？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Thief's Use Magic Device feature allow them to use spell scrolls?
entries: 是的。意图是让盗贼可以使用使用魔法装置技能来使用法术卷轴。

entries.name: 盗贼能否使用快手特性来使用或涂抹毒药？
entries.ENG_name: Can a Thief use Fast Hands to use or apply poisons?
entries: Yes. Administering poison uses the {@action 使用物件} action.

entries.name: 术士
entries.ENG_name: Sorcerer

entries.name: 如果一个术士使用微妙法术施放一个只有口头或肢体成分的法术，对手能否使用反制法术对其进行反击？
entries.ENG_name: If a sorcerer casts a spell with only verbal or somatic components using Subtle Spell, can an opponent use counterspell against it?
entries: If a spell that's altered by Subtle Spell has no material component, then it's impossible for anyone to perceive the spell being cast. So, since you can't see the casting, {@spell 反制法术} is of no use.

entries.name: 变体魔法规则规定你不能在单个法术上使用多种变体魔法选项。你能多次使用一个选项吗？
entries.ENG_name: Metamagic rules state you can't use multiple Metamagic options on a single spell. Can you use one option multiple times?
entries: 术士在施放法术时可以使用一种魔法变形选项一次，不能多次使用相同的选项。例如，术士不能通过花费2点术士点数在扩展法术上使法术的持续时间翻四倍。

entries.name: 元素亲和提升一个法术的伤害骰，而不是多个骰子？所以使用灼热射线时，我不是将我的感知调整值加到每个命中的射线上？
entries.ENG_name: Elemental Affinity improves one damage roll of a spell, not multiple rolls? So with scorching ray, I don't add my Charisma modifier to each ray that hits?
entries: That's correct. Elemental Affinity benefits one damage roll per casting of a spell, even if the spell allows more than one roll. So, for example, the feature improves one of the rays of a {@spell 灼热射线} spell or one of the beams of an {@spell 魔能爆} spell.

entries.name: 增强法术特性能否影响灼热射线法术的所有射线，还是只能影响其中一条？
entries.ENG_name: Can Empowered Spell affect all the rays of a scorching ray spell, or just one?
entries: A sorcerer's Empowered Spell could affect more than one ray of a {@spell 灼热射线}, abiding by the feature's die limit. For instance, if you create three rays with the spell and you have a +3 Charisma modifier, you could reroll one of the damage dice for each ray, or two of the damage dice for one ray and one of the damage dice for another one.

entries.name: 迅捷法术允许术士在一轮中施放两个1级或更高级别的法术吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does Quickened Spell allow a sorcerer to cast two spells a round of 1st level or higher?
entries: 不，术士必须遵循作为奖励动作施放法术以及在同一回合施放另一个法术的规则；另一个法术必须是施法时间为1个动作的戏法。

entries.name: 我的术士可以在通过施放{@spell wish}法术复制的法术上使用双重法术吗？如果可以，它需要消耗多少术士点数？
entries.ENG_name: Can my sorcerer use Twinned Spell on a spell duplicated by the casting of a {@spell wish} spell? And if so, how many sorcery points does it cost?
entries: 是的，你可以。它需要消耗与你复制的法术等级相应的术士点数。

entries.name: 巫师的野魔法涌动效果（{@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB}）是替换触发它的法术的效果，还是两者的效果都会发生？
entries.ENG_name: Does a sorcerer's {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} effect replace the effect of the spell that triggered it, or do both effects happen?
entries: 法术和{@table 野魔法涌动|PHB}效果都会发生。正如《玩家手册》（PHB）的勘误表中澄清的，通常需要{@book 集中|PHB|10|Concentration}的涌动效果在这种情况下不需要集中。

entries.name: 契术师
entries.ENG_name: Warlock

entries.name: 由扩展法术列表特性赋予的术士法术是否计入已知法术的数量？
entries.ENG_name: Do warlock spells granted by the Expanded Spell List feature count against the number of spells known?
entries: 那个特性赋予的法术并不是术士自动已知的。这些法术被添加到术士的法术列表中，术士可以在学习相应等级的新术士法术时选择它们。一旦学会，这样的法术确实会计入术士所知法术的数量。

entries.name: 符文守护者之眼的祈唤对魔法符文有效吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Eyes of the Rune Keeper invocation work on magical runes?
entries: 符文守护者之眼让你能够阅读任何形式的书写，包括符文的语言意义，如果有的话。

entries.name: 如果一个术士使用刀刃契约与魔法武器绑定，那个武器必须是近战武器吗？术士可以改变武器的形态吗？
entries.ENG_name: If a warlock uses Pact of the Blade to bond with a magic weapon, does that weapon have to be a melee weapon, and can the warlock change the weapon's form?
entries: 术士的剑刃契约特性允许你无中生有地创造一把近战武器。每当你这样做时，你将决定武器的形式，从《玩家手册》中《武器》表的近战武器选项中选择。例如，你可以创造一把{@item 大斧|PHB}，然后再次使用这个特性来创造一把{@item 标枪|PHB}，这会导致大斧消失。

你也可以使用剑之契约与魔法武器建立联系，将其变成你的契约武器。这个魔法武器不一定是近战武器，例如，你可以对一个{@item +1 长弓}使用这个特性。一旦建立了联系，当你召唤你的契约武器时，魔法武器就会出现，当它出现时你不能改变魔法武器的形式。例如，如果你与一个{@item Flame Tongue Longsword||flame tongue (longsword)}建立了联系并将其发送到一个异次元空间，当你召唤它时，武器会以长剑的形式回来。你不能将其变成一个棍棒。类似地，如果你与一个{@item dagger of venom}建立了联系，你不能将其召唤为一个钉头锤；它总是一把匕首。
这个特性允许召唤出一把近战武器，然而我们允许魔法武器有更多的多样性。我们不想让这个特性的狭窄焦点让术士在战役中出现各种魔法武器时感到不快。这种多样性是否扩展到特性的近战主题之外？确实如此，但如果这样做可能会增加玩家的幸福感，我们愿意偶尔弯曲一个设计理念。

entries.name: 如果你是契约之刃的术士，其他人能否使用你的契约武器？
entries.ENG_name: If you're a Pact of the Blade warlock, can someone else wield your pact weapon?
entries: 是的。在武器消失之前，除了术士之外的其他人可以使用契约武器。

entries.name: 术士的觉醒心智特性是否允许双向心灵感应交流？
entries.ENG_name: Does the warlock's Awakened Mind feature allow two-way telepathic communication?
entries: 这个特性旨在提供单向通信。术士可以使用这个特性向生物进行心灵感应交流，但这个特性并没有赋予那个生物心灵感应回复的能力。相比之下，一些怪物拥有的心灵感应能力（{@i MM}, "{@book 心灵感应|MM|0|心灵感应}"）确实使得双向通信成为可能。

entries.name: 使用额外行动打破术士的影遁术特性的隐形状态吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does using a bonus action break invisibility from a warlock's One with Shadows invocation?
entries: Taking a bonus action breaks the {@condition 隐形|phb|invisibility} of a warlock's One with Shadows. A bonus action is an action.

entries.name: 法师
entries.ENG_name: Wizard

entries.name: 防护系法师的奥术守护只有在守护生命值为0时才会被治愈吗？
entries.ENG_name: Is an abjurer's Arcane Ward healed only when the ward has 0 hit points?
entries: 当防护系法术师施放1级或更高等级的防护系法术时，守卫就会恢复生命值，而不仅仅是当守卫生命值为0时。与正常治疗一样，守卫恢复的生命值不能超过其生命值上限：两倍的巫师等级加上巫师的智力调整值。

entries.name: 施放警戒法术作为仪式能否治愈奥术守卫？
entries.ENG_name: Does casting alarm as a ritual heal Arcane Ward?
entries: 任何由防护系法师施放的1级或更高级别的防护系法术，包括仪式，都可以恢复防护系法师的奥术守护的生命值。

entries.name: 奥术守护如何与防护系法术师可能拥有的临时生命值和伤害抗性相互作用？
entries.ENG_name: How does Arcane Ward interact with temporary hit points and damage resistance that an abjurer might have?
entries: 奥术守护不是创造它的巫师的延伸。它是一个拥有自己生命值的魔法效果。巫师所拥有的任何临时生命值、免疫或抗性都不适用于守护。
守卫先受到伤害。任何剩余的伤害由巫师承担，并按照以下游戏元素顺序进行：(1) 任何相关的伤害免疫，(2) 任何相关的伤害抗性，(3) 任何临时生命值，以及(4) 实际生命值。

entries.name: 一个防护学派的巫师在14级时获得对法术伤害的抗性。当法术击中防护学派巫师时，他们的奥术守卫是否获得这种抗性？
entries.ENG_name: An abjurer gains resistance to spell damage at 14th level. Does the abjurer's Arcane Ward gain this resistance when a spell hits the abjurer?
entries: 在14级时，获得抗性的是防护系法师，而不是奥术守护。

entries.name: 咒法大师的强力戏法特性是否适用于需要攻击骰的戏法，还是仅适用于需要豁免的戏法？
entries.ENG_name: Does the evoker's Potent Cantrip feature apply to cantrips with attack rolls or only to saves?
entries: Potent Cantrip affects only cantrips that require a saving throw, such as {@spell 酸液溅爆} and {@spell 毒气喷洒}.

entries.name: 14级幻术师能力是否允许你每轮都使某物变成真实的，还是只能一次？
entries.ENG_name: Does the 14th-level illusionist ability let you make something real every round, or just once?
entries: 幻象现实旨在使每个幻象法术中的一个幻象物体变为真实。

entries.name: 对于变化学院的变形特性，如果我只是想施放多态性而不使用法术槽，是否需要准备这个法术？
entries.ENG_name: For the Shapechanger feature of the School of Transmutation, does polymorph need to be prepared if I only want to cast it without using a spell slot?
entries: A transmuter must have {@spell 变形术} prepared, as normal, to cast it with the Shapechanger feature.

entries.name: 如果巫师没有看过所有的文本，次级召唤术能否创造出一本书的副本，包括所有的文本？
entries.ENG_name: Can Minor Conjuration create a copy of a book, complete with all its text, if the wizard hasn't seen all the text?
entries: 不。在多部分对象的情况下，意图是你必须看到了对象的所有部分才能复制这些部分。在书的情况下，如果你只看了封面，那么创建的副本将只是封面的复制品，而页面将是空白的。

entries.name: 一个位于以太位面的预言学院巫师可以使用卜卦能力对物质位面上可以看到的生物使用吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a School of Divination wizard on the Ethereal Plane use Portent on a creature that the wizard can see on the Material Plane?
entries: 是的。预示术要求你能看到目标生物，但它没有距离限制。

entries.name: 对于巫师来说，要施放包含在他们的法术书中的仪式法术，他们需要从书中阅读还是将其作为仪式的一部分使用？
entries.ENG_name: For a wizard to cast a ritual spell contained in their spellbook, do they need to read from the book or use it as part of the ritual?
entries: 不。按照规则的书面表述，它并不要求你必须从书中阅读。然而，从叙事意图上讲，巫师是从他们的书中阅读，但唯一的机械要求是巫师的法术书中有这个法术。

entries.name: 背景
entries.ENG_name: Backgrounds

entries.name: 你能否拥有不止一个背景？
entries.ENG_name: Can you have more than one background?
entries: 不。你只能有一个背景。它确立了你在开始冒险生涯之前生活中的关键方面。如果现有的背景没有一个符合你的角色概念，与你的DM讨论，并使用《玩家手册》中的{@book 指南|PHB|4|Backgrounds}来定制你自己的背景。

entries.name: 装备
entries.ENG_name: Equipment

entries.name: 重型盔甲是否会降低除潜行外的敏捷豁免检定或能力检定？
entries.ENG_name: Does heavy armor reduce Dexterity saving throws or ability checks other than Stealth?
entries: If you have proficiency with it, {@book heavy armor|PHB|5|Heavy Armor} doesn't affect Dexterity saving throws or ability checks, other than {@skill 隐匿}.

entries.name: 如果你用盾牌攻击——很可能是作为简易武器——你还能保留+2的护甲等级（AC）加成吗？
entries.ENG_name: If you attack with a shield—most likely as an improvised weapon—do you keep the +2 bonus to AC?
entries: 使用盾牌攻击不会剥夺盾牌对护甲等级（AC）的加值。

entries.name: 兼职
entries.ENG_name: Multiclassing

entries.name: 能力值的提升是依赖于职业等级，而不是总等级吗？
entries.ENG_name: Are ability score improvements class-level dependent, rather than total level?
entries: 能力值提升是基于你在特定职业的等级，而不是如果你多职业的话的总角色等级。例如，如果你是一个4级的多职业角色，你还没有获得能力值提升特性，因为你还没有达到任何一个职业的4级。

entries.name: 临时的属性提升能否满足职业转换的先决条件，还是必须基础属性达到要求？
entries.ENG_name: Would a temporary stat bump fulfill a multiclass prerequisite, or does the base score have to meet the requirement?
entries: 必须满足基础属性得分，而非临时得分，以满足兼职的先决条件。

entries.name: 当你多职业时，你能否从所有职业中获得戏法？
entries.ENG_name: When multiclassing, do you get the cantrips from all your classes?
entries: 如果您的任何职业赋予了您戏法，您将获得它们全部。

entries.name: 当你多职业时，是否会获得更多豁免投掷的熟练度？
entries.ENG_name: Do you gain proficiency in more saving throws when multiclassing?
entries: 一个职业提供了各种起始熟练度，如果你是首次选择该职业，你就会获得这些熟练度。如果该职业不是你的第一个职业，你只会获得多职业熟练度表中为该职业列出的起始熟练度。该表中不包括任何豁免投掷熟练度。
不论一个职业是否是你的第一个职业，你确实会获得该职业通过其特性所赋予的任何熟练度。例如，如果你在牧师职业上获得一级，并选择了战争领域，即使你的第一个职业不是牧师，你也会从奖励熟练度特性中受益。

entries.name: 如果狂战士/牧师在进入狂暴状态前施放了灵界武器，他们能否在狂暴时使用它进行攻击？
entries.ENG_name: Can a barbarian/cleric use spiritual weapon to attack while raging, if it is cast before entering rage?
entries: A barbarian's Rage feature makes {@book concentration|PHB|10|Concentration} impossible but has no effect on spells, like {@spell 灵体武器}, that don't require concentration.

entries.name: 一个野蛮人/战士（战斗大师）在狂暴状态下可以使用策略吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a barbarian/fighter (Battle Master) use maneuvers while raging?
entries: 野蛮人的狂怒特性中没有任何内容禁止使用机动。

entries.name: 流氓/武僧能否使用徒手攻击进行偷袭？
entries.ENG_name: Can a rogue/monk use Sneak Attack with unarmed strikes?
entries: 偷袭特性适用于具有灵巧或远程属性的武器。徒手攻击不是武器，因此不符合条件。相比之下，盗贼/武僧可以使用具有所需属性之一的武僧武器，如{@item 短剑|PHB}或{@item 匕首|PHB}，来使用偷袭。

entries.name: 巫师多职业成为野魔法巫师。如果从他们的法术书中施放的法术在巫师法术列表上，是否触发野魔法涌动（{@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB}），还是必须从巫师职业获得这些法术才会触发？
entries.ENG_name: A wizard multiclasses into Wild Magic sorcerer. Do spells cast from their spellbook trigger {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} if they are on the sorcerer spell list, or do they have to gain them from sorcerer to trigger?
entries: 根据《{@book 多职业规则|PHB|6|Spellcasting}》：“你所知道并准备的每个法术都与你的一个职业相关联”。这条规则意味着只有从术士等级获得的法术才会触发{@table 野性魔法涌动|PHB}。

entries.name: 专长
entries.ENG_name: Feats

entries.name: 冲锋手
entries.ENG_name: Charger

entries.name: 如果您拥有冲锋专长，当您的坐骑采取疾行动作时，您能否进行冲锋攻击？
entries.ENG_name: If you have the Charger feat, can you make your charge attack when your mount takes the Dash action?
entries: The {@feat Charger} feat relies on you, not your mount, taking the {@action 疾走} action.

entries.name: 强弩专家
entries.ENG_name: Crossbow Expert

entries.name: 十字弓专家的第二个好处有助于远程法术攻击，这是有意为之吗？
entries.ENG_name: Is it intentional that the second benefit of Crossbow Expert helps ranged spell attacks?
entries: 是的，这是有意为之。当你在敌人5英尺范围内进行远程攻击检定时，通常会受到不利影响。{@feat 弩箭专家}的第二个好处是防止你受到这种不利影响，无论远程攻击是否使用弩。
在设计一个使用范围较窄的特性时，我们会考虑至少增加一个能让角色更广泛受益的元素——一种你的角从一种情况转移到另一种情况时所带来的一些精通。例如，{@feat 十字弓专家}的第二个好处就是这样一个元素，{@feat 巨武大师}的第一个好处也是如此。十字弓专家中的这个元素显示了角色对某一类事物的专业知识——在这种情况下是十字弓——转移到了其他事物上。

entries.name: 十字弓专家的第一个和第三个好处是否将手弩变成了半自动武器？
entries.ENG_name: Do the first and third benefits of Crossbow Expert turn a hand crossbow into a semiautomatic weapon?
entries: 简短的答案是不行。

该特性的第一个好处是，如果你熟悉那种武器，你可以忽略手弩（{@item hand crossbow|PHB}）的装填属性。这意味着，如果你有像额外攻击这样的特性，你可以多次发射它。然而，由于武器具有弹药属性，你仍然受到限制。后一个属性要求你必须有弩箭才能从手弩（{@item hand crossbow|PHB}）发射，而且手弩不会自己装填（除非它是魔法的或是一个侏儒的发明）。你需要将每支弩箭装填到武器中，这样做需要一只手。
为了深入理解这一点，让我们看看弹药属性定义中的以下句子："从箭袋、盒子或其他容器中取出弹药是攻击的一部分。" 这句话告诉我们两个重要的事情。首先，我们假定你是在用手抓取——即从容器中取出——弹药。其次，取出弹药的行为包括在攻击中，因此不需要自己的行动，也不会消耗你回合中与物品互动的免费机会。
对于《玩家手册》中的{@item 手弩|PHB}来说，这意味着{@feat 十字弓专家}可以让你在使用像额外攻击这样的特性时，只要有足够的弹药并且有一只手空闲来装填，就可以多次发射手弩。

entries.name: 十字弓专家是否允许你先发射一把手弩，然后作为额外行动再次发射它？
entries.ENG_name: Does Crossbow Expert let you fire a hand crossbow and then fire it again as a bonus action?
entries: It does! Take a look at the feat's third benefit. It says you can attack with a hand crossbow as a bonus action when you use the {@action 攻击} action to attack with a one-handed weapon. A {@item hand crossbow|PHB} is a one-handed weapon, so it can, indeed, be used for both attacks, assuming you have a hand free to load the hand crossbow between the two attacks.

entries.name: 双持客
entries.ENG_name: Dual Wielder

entries.name: 如果我的角色拥有双持武器特性，她能否挥舞两把重型武器？
entries.ENG_name: Can my character wield two heavy weapons if she has the Dual Wielder feat?
entries: 不。{@feat 双武器战士}特性允许你挥舞两把单手武器。《玩家手册》（PHB）中的所有重型武器也都具有双手特性。

entries.name: 元素导师
entries.ENG_name: Elemental Adept

entries.name: 元素大师是唯一可以多次选择的专长吗？
entries.ENG_name: Is Elemental Adept the only feat you can take more than once?
entries: {@feat 元素专家}是《玩家手册》（PHB）中唯一可以多次选择的特性。

entries.name: 巨武器大师
entries.ENG_name: Great Weapon Master

entries.name: 使用重武器大师特性，你必须立即采取奖励行动，还是可以在同一个回合中先移动然后再使用它？
entries.ENG_name: With the Great Weapon Master feat, do you have to take the bonus action immediately, or could you move and then use it on the same turn?
entries: 你在自己回合的任何时间点，只要在使用额外行动的攻击命中后，就可以采取额外行动。所以，是的，如果你还有移动剩余，你可以在采取额外行动之前移动。

entries.name: 幸运
entries.ENG_name: Lucky

entries.name: 幸运特性如何与优势和劣势相互作用？
entries.ENG_name: How does the Lucky feat interact with advantage and disadvantage?
entries: The {@feat Lucky} feat represents extraordinary luck that can help you when you need it most. It lets you spend a luck point; roll an extra {@dice d20} for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw; and then choose which {@dice d20} to use. This is true no matter how many d20s are in the mix. For example, if you have advantage or disadvantage on your attack roll, you could spend a luck point, roll a third {@dice d20}, and then decide which of the three dice to use. You still have advantage or disadvantage, since the feat doesn't say it negates it, but you get to pick the die. The upshot of this fact is that a rogue, for instance, who has disadvantage on an attack roll couldn't use Sneak Attack even if the rogue uses the Lucky feat to pick the die.
{@feat 幸运}特性是一般规则例外的一个很好的例子。在这种情况下的一般规则是告诉我们优势和劣势如何运作的规则。具体规则是幸运特性，我们知道如果它们相互冲突，具体规则会优先于一般规则。

If a DM wants advantage and disadvantage to play their normal roles even when the {@feat Lucky} feat is used, here's a way to do so: roll two d20s for advantage/disadvantage, roll a third {@dice d20} for Lucky, eliminate one of the three dice, and then use the higher (for advantage) or lower (for disadvantage) of the two dice that remain.

entries.name: 魔法学徒
entries.ENG_name: Magic Initiate

entries.name: 如果你是施法者，当你获得魔法入门专长时，你可以选择自己的职业吗？
entries.ENG_name: If you're a spellcaster, can you pick your own class when you gain the Magic Initiate feat?
entries: 是的，特性并没有说你不能。例如，如果你是一个巫师并且获得了{@feat 魔法新手}特性，你可以选择巫师，从而学习两个更多的巫师戏法和另一个1级巫师法术。

entries.name: 如果你有法术槽，你可以使用它们来施放你通过魔法入门特性学会的1级法术吗？
entries.ENG_name: If you have spell slots, can you use them to cast the 1st-level spell you learn with the Magic Initiate feat?
entries: 是的，但前提是你为特性选择的职业必须是你已有的职业之一。例如，如果你选择了术士，并且你本身就是术士，那么该职业的施法特性告诉你，你可以使用你的法术位来施放你所知道的术士法术，所以你可以使用你的法术位来施放你从{@feat 魔法新手}学到的1级术士法术。同样，如果你是巫师，并为特性选择了巫师职业，你将学到一个1级巫师法术，你可以将其添加到你的法术书中，并随后准备。
简而言之，您必须遵循您角色的正常施法规则，这些规则决定了您是否可以将法术位用于从魔法入门获得的1级法术。

entries.name: 长柄武器大师
entries.ENG_name: Polearm Master

entries.name: 我可以将我的力量调整值加到长兵器大师给我的额外攻击的伤害上吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can I add my Strength modifier to the damage of the bonus attack that Polearm Master gives me?
entries: Yes. If you have the feat and use the {@action 攻击} action to attack with a {@item glaive|PHB}, {@item halberd|PHB}, or {@item quarterstaff|PHB}, you can also strike with the weapon's opposite end as a bonus action. For that bonus attack, you add your ability modifier to the attack roll, as you do whenever you attack with that weapon, and if you hit, you add the same ability modifier to the damage roll, which is normal for weapon {@book damage rolls|PHB|9|Damage Rolls}.
一个具体规则，比如双手战斗的规则，可能会打破一般规则，告诉你在计算伤害时不要加上你的能力值修正。{@feat 长兵器大师}没有这样的规则。

entries.name: 长兵器大师特性是否允许我对被迫接近我的目标进行机会攻击？
entries.ENG_name: Does Polearm Master let me make an opportunity attack against a target that is being forced to approach me?
entries: A creature doesn't provoke an opportunity attack if it is moved without the use of its movement, its action, or its {@book reaction|PHB|9|Reactions}. For example, the effect of the {@spell 嫌恶/共感术} spell requires the target to use its movement, meaning that it would provoke opportunity attacks when it does so.

Similarly, {@spell 噪音暗语} requires the target to move using its {@book reaction|PHB|9|Reactions} (if available), so that activity also provokes opportunity attacks. In contrast, a creature that's pushed by a {@spell 造风术} spell does not provoke opportunity attacks.

entries.name: 凶蛮打手
entries.ENG_name: Savage Attacker

entries.name: 野蛮攻击者特性是否适用于徒手攻击？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Savage Attacker feat work with unarmed strikes?
entries: 不。{@feat 野蛮攻击者}依赖于武器的伤害骰，而徒手攻击不被视为武器（这一点在《玩家手册》(Player's Handbook)的勘误表中已经明确)。

entries.name: 野蛮攻击者特性的好处是否适用于额外效果，如盗贼的偷袭攻击或圣武士的神圣打击？
entries.ENG_name: Does the benefit of the Savage Attacker feat apply to additional effects like the rogue's Sneak Attack or the paladin's Divine Smite?
entries: 不。{@feat 野蛮攻击者}的好处仅适用于武器伤害骰的掷骰，不适用于任何特性或其他能力可能授予的额外伤害。

entries.name: 哨兵
entries.ENG_name: Sentinel

entries.name: 哨兵特性的第三个好处所赋予的攻击是在触发攻击之前还是之后进行？
entries.ENG_name: Does the attack granted by the third benefit of the Sentinel feat take place before or after the triggering attack?
entries: 额外攻击发生在触发攻击之后。原因如下：特性没有指定额外攻击的时机，当一个{@book 反应|PHB|9|Reactions}没有指定时机时，反应发生在其触发事件结束后（《{@i DMG}》, "{@book 判定反应时机|DMG|8|Adjudicating Reaction Timing}"）。相比之下，{@book 机会攻击|PHB|9|Opportunity Attacks}明确发生在其触发事件结束之前——也就是说，正好在目标生物离开你的触及范围之前。

entries.name: 哨兵特性如何对抗具有花式步伐或机动特性的敌人？
entries.ENG_name: How does the Sentinel feat work against an enemy that has Fancy Footwork or the Mobile feat?
entries: Does the character with the {@feat Sentinel} feat still get the opportunity attack? The second benefit of the Sentinel feat is intended to counteract the {@action 撤离} action only. An enemy with the Fancy Footwork feature ({@book Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide|SCAG}) or one that has the {@feat Mobile} feat can avoid provoking opportunity attacks from someone who has the Sentinel feat, as long as that enemy doesn't take the {@action 撤离} action.

entries.name: 盾牌大师
entries.ENG_name: Shield Master

entries.name: 盾牌大师专长允许您在采取攻击动作时作为奖励动作推搡某人。您能否在攻击动作之前采取该奖励动作？
entries.ENG_name: The Shield Master feat lets you shove someone as a bonus action if you take the Attack action. Can you take that bonus action before the Attack action?
entries: No. The bonus action provided by the {@feat Shield Master} feat has a precondition: that you take the {@action 攻击} action on your turn. Intending to take that action isn't sufficient; you must actually take it before you can take the bonus action. During your turn, you do get to decide when to take the bonus action after you've taken the Attack action.
这种如果-那么的设定出现在游戏的许多规则中。必须先满足'如果'的条件，'那么'的部分才会生效。

entries.name: 健壮
entries.ENG_name: Tough

entries.name: 坚韧特性对处于兽形态的德鲁伊有影响吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does the Tough feat have an effect for a druid while in beast form?
entries: 意图是否定的。{@feat 坚韧}特性影响德鲁伊的生命值，在使用野性变身时被野兽的生命值所取代。

entries.name: 属性检定
entries.ENG_name: Ability Checks

entries.name: 攻击检定和豁免投掷基本上是专门的能力检定吗？
entries.ENG_name: Are attack rolls and saving throws basically specialized ability checks?
entries: They aren't. It's easy to mistake the three rolls as three faces of the same thing, because they each involve rolling a {@dice d20}, adding any modifiers, and comparing the total to a {@book Difficulty Class|PHB|7|Ability Checks}, and they're all subject to advantage and disadvantage. In short, they share the same procedure for determining success or failure.

Despite this common procedure, the three rolls are separate from each other. If something in the game, like the {@spell 神导术} spell, affects one of them, the other two aren't affected unless the rules specifically say so. The next few questions touch on this point again.

entries.name: 你能否在能力检定上获得致命一击？例如，在摔跤尝试中，是致命一击获胜，还是最高数字获胜？
entries.ENG_name: Can you get a critical hit on an ability check? For example, on a grapple attempt, does a critical win, or the highest number?
entries: 能力检定不会有致命一击。攻击骰则有。

entries.name: 在能力检定时，1点是自动失败吗？
entries.ENG_name: Is a 1 on an ability check an automatic failure?
entries: 在能力检定或豁免投掷中掷出1点不是自动失败。在攻击骰中掷出1点是自动未命中。

entries.name: 如果您施放了诅咒法术并选择力量作为受影响的能力，目标在使用力量的攻击检定和豁免投掷上是否也处于不利状态？
entries.ENG_name: If you cast the hex spell and choose Strength as the affected ability, does the target also have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws that use Strength?
entries: No, the {@spell 脆弱诅咒} spell's description says it affects ability checks that use the chosen ability. The description says nothing about affecting attack rolls or saving throws. This means, for example, that if you choose Constitution, the spell's target doesn't suffer disadvantage when trying to maintain {@book concentration|PHB|10|Concentration} on a spell, since concentration requires a Constitution saving throw, not a Constitution check.
想知道这个法术的意图吗？这个法术旨在成为一个经典的厄运——就像民间传说中看到的那样——它在战斗中和战斗外都很有用。在战斗中，这个法术提供了一些额外的死灵伤害。在战斗之外，你可以通过施放这个法术并给一个狡猾的外交官的感知检定带来劣势，来破坏他或她的计划。

entries.name: 吟游诗人的万事通特性是否适用于不使用吟游诗人熟练加值的攻击卷和豁免投掷？
entries.ENG_name: Does the bard's Jack of All Trades feature apply to attack rolls and saving throws that don't use the bard's proficiency bonus?
entries: 不。这项特性仅对能力检定有益。别忘了先攻检定是敏捷检定，所以万事通专长可以提高吟游诗人的先攻，假设吟游诗人尚未将其熟练加值加到它上面。

entries.name: 当你进行力量（运动）检定来抓住或推搡某人时，你是在进行攻击骰吗？
entries.ENG_name: When you make a Strength (Athletics) check to grapple or shove someone, are you making an attack roll?
entries: No. That check is an ability check, so game effects tied to attack rolls don't apply to it. Going back to an earlier question, the {@spell 脆弱诅咒} spell could be used to diminish a grappler's effectiveness. And if the grappler's target is under the effect of the {@action 闪避} action, that action doesn't inhibit the {@book grapple|PHB|9|Grappling}, since Dodge doesn't affect ability checks.

entries.name: 冒险
entries.ENG_name: Adventuring

entries.name: 在一天内角色可以进行多少次短休息，是否有严格的限制，还是这完全由DM来决定？
entries.ENG_name: Is there a hard limit on how many short rests characters can take in a day, or is this purely up to the DM to decide?
entries: 你在一天内可以进行的{@book 短休息|PHB|8|Short Rest}数量的唯一硬性限制是一天内的小时数。实际上，你还会因为故事中的时间压力和敌人的干扰而受到限制。

entries.name: 是的，超维度空间，如半位面或由绳索魔法创造的空间，被认为是存在于不同的位面。
entries.ENG_name: Are extradimensional spaces, such as a demiplane or the space created by rope trick, considered to be on a different plane of existence?
entries: 超维度空间（也称为异次元空间）位于其他平面之外。因此，如果您在物质界，而您的敌人在超维度空间，那么你们两个不在同一个存在平面上。

entries.name: 在游戏中如何判断某个东西是否具有魔法属性？
entries.ENG_name: How do I tell if something in the game is magical?
entries: 关于这个主题的广泛讨论，请参见下面“{@book 怪物|SAC|0|怪物}”部分中的问题“{@book 龙的呼吸武器是否具有魔法效果？|SAC|0|龙的呼吸武器是否具有魔法效果？}”。

entries.name: 减少疲劳状态的一个效果示例是什么？
entries.ENG_name: What's an example of an effect that can reduce exhaustion?
entries: The {@spell 高等复原术} spell can reduce exhaustion.

entries.name: 有没有办法恢复失去的智力，比如在智力吞噬者将其降至零之后？
entries.ENG_name: Is there a way to get lost Intelligence back, such as after an intellect devourer zeroes it?
entries: The {@spell 高等复原术} spell can remove the reduction to an ability score.

entries.name: 在20级之后，游戏通常会进入一个更为开放的阶段，称为“史诗等级”（Epic Boons）。在这个阶段，角色可以继续获得经验值，但不再像之前那样提升等级。相反，他们可以获得特殊的奖励或能力，这些奖励或能力被称为“史诗天赋”（Epic Boons）。至于角色等级的上限，这取决于游戏主持人（DM）的设定和游戏的具体规则。在标准的《玩家手册》（PHB）中，20级是最高等级，但有些游戏可能会允许角色达到更高的等级。
entries.ENG_name: What happens after 20th level? Is there a cap to character levels?
entries: 最高等级是20级。《地下城主指南》(Dungeon Master's Guide)中的“{@book 史诗赐福|DMG|7|史诗赐福}”部分提供了进一步进阶的灵感。

entries.name: The {@condition 恐惧} condition says "while the source of its fear is within line of sight." Does that mean you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks even if the source is {@condition 隐形} but you have a clear line to its space?
entries.ENG_name: The {@condition frightened} condition says "while the source of its fear is within line of sight." Does that mean you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks even if the source is {@condition invisible} but you have a clear line to its space?
entries: 不。如果你看不见某物，那它就不在你的视野范围内。说到“视野范围”，游戏使用的是这个英语术语的普通含义，在规则中没有特殊含义。

entries.name: 在进行短休息时施放法术会中断休息吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does casting a spell while taking a short rest interrupt the rest?
entries: 是的。施法比《玩家手册》第186页列出的活动更为劳累：'吃饭、喝水、阅读和照料伤口'。

entries.name: 战斗
entries.ENG_name: Combat

entries.name: 惊慌是否在先攻顺序之外作为一个特别的惊慌轮发生？
entries.ENG_name: Does surprise happen outside the initiative order as a special surprise round?
entries: 不，惊喜是这样运作的。

任何战斗的第一步是：地下城主决定战斗中是否有人被{@quickref 突袭|PHB|3|0|突袭}（重新阅读《玩家手册》中的“{@book 一步一步战斗|PHB|9|一步一步战斗}”）。这个决定在战斗中只发生一次，且只在开始时。换句话说，一旦战斗开始，你就不能再次被{@quickref 突袭|PHB|3|0|突袭}，尽管隐藏的敌人仍然可以获得未被发现时的正常好处（见《玩家手册》中的“{@book 未被发现的攻击者和目标|PHB|9|未被发现的攻击者和目标}”）。

要处于{@quickref 惊慌|PHB|3|0|惊慌}状态，您必须措手不及，通常是因为您未能注意到敌人的潜行，或者被具有特殊能力如{@creature 凝胶立方体||凝胶立方体}的透明特性的敌人惊吓，这使得它特别令人惊讶。即使您的同伴没有惊慌，您也可能处于{@quickref 惊慌|PHB|3|0|惊慌}状态，如果至少有一个敌人未能让您措手不及，您就不会处于{@quickref 惊慌|PHB|3|0|惊慌}状态。

如果任何人处于{@quickref 惊喜|PHB|3|0|surprised}状态，那么还没有采取任何行动。首先，按照正常方式进行先攻骰。然后，战斗的第一轮开始，{@quickref 未惊喜|PHB|3|0|unsurprised}的战斗者按照先攻顺序行动。处于{@quickref 惊喜|PHB|3|0|surprised}状态的生物在其第一回合结束前不能移动或采取行动或{@book 反应|PHB|9|Reactions}（记住，不能采取行动也意味着你不能采取额外行动）。实际上，处于{@quickref 惊喜|PHB|3|0|surprised}状态的生物在战斗中跳过了它的第一回合。一旦那个回合结束，该生物不再处于{@quickref 惊喜|PHB|3|0|surprised}状态。
简而言之，战斗中的活动总是由先攻顺序决定的，无论是否有人被{@quickref 突袭|PHB|3|0|突袭}，并且在第一轮战斗结束后，突袭不再是一个因素。你仍然可以尝试隐藏自己以躲避敌人并获得隐藏带来的好处，但你这样做时并不会剥夺敌人的回合。

entries.name: 突袭规则适用于两个对立的方面。当第三组战斗者从隐蔽处潜行而来，对混战进行伏击时，会发生什么？
entries.ENG_name: Surprise rules work for two opposing sides. What happens with surprise when a third group of combatants sneaks up, hidden from the melee, and ambushes?
entries: The surprise rule is relevant only when a combat is starting. Any ambushes during the fight use the rules for Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks.

entries.name: 如果一个巫师在突袭轮中施放像火球这样的法术，敌人在他们的豁免投掷上会受到劣势吗？
entries.ENG_name: If a wizard casts a spell like fireball during a surprise round, do the enemies get disadvantage on their saving throw?
entries: 处于{@quickref 惊慌|PHB|3|0|惊慌}状态对豁免投掷没有影响。如果您处于{@quickref 惊慌|PHB|3|0|惊慌}状态，在战斗的第一个回合中您不能移动或采取行动，并且在那个回合结束之前您不能采取{@book 反应|PHB|9|反应}。

entries.name: 你可以推迟你的回合并在稍后的轮次中进行吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can you delay your turn and take it later in the round?
entries: No. When it's your turn, either you do something or you don't. If you don't want to do anything, consider taking the {@action 闪避} action so that you'll, at least, have some extra protection. If you want to wait to act in response to something, take the {@action 准备} action, which lets you take part of your turn later.
由于多种原因，我们没有包括延迟你的回合的选项：

items: 您的回合涉及多个决策，包括移动位置和采取什么行动。如果您可以推迟您的回合，您的决策过程可能会变慢，因为您将不得不考虑是否要进行您的回合。将这种额外分析乘以战斗中角色和怪物的数量，您就可能在游戏过程中遇到多次减速。
推迟你的回合的能力可以使先攻变得毫无意义，因为角色和怪物在先攻顺序中来回跳动。如果战斗者可以随意改变他们在先攻顺序中的位置，那么为什么要使用先攻呢？最重要的是，改变先攻很容易变成一项不受欢迎的杂务，特别是对于地下城主来说，他可能不得不在战斗中一遍又一遍地改变先攻列表。
能够延迟你的回合可以让你对法术和其他效果的持续时间造成严重破坏，特别是那些持续到你下一回合的。简单地通过改变你的回合发生的时间，你就可以改变某些法术的持续时间。防范这种滥用的方法将是创建一套额外的规则，这些规则将限制你改变持续时间的能力。最终效果？游戏将增加更多的复杂性，而随着复杂性的增加，游戏速度变慢的潜力也越大。

entries: 我们对战斗的两个目标是让它快速进行，并且让先攻变得重要。我们不想通过掷先攻来开始每场战斗，然后用延迟选项破坏回合顺序。此外，我们认为在战斗中不应该把注意力放在玩弄先攻上。相反，战斗者的戏剧性行动应该是焦点，回合应该尽可能快地发生。

entries.name: 你可以停止准备动作来进行偷袭攻击。准备动作并不是一个完整的回合承诺。根据《玩家手册》中关于准备动作的规则，你可以在决定行动时选择采取不同的行动，包括偷袭攻击。然而，一旦你采取了行动，比如进行了偷袭攻击，你就不能再继续你的准备动作了。
entries.ENG_name: I have a readied action. Can I stop readying to take an opportunity attack? Or is ready a full turn commitment?
entries: 如果你准备了一个行动，你可以进行机会攻击，这将导致你停止准备。

entries.name: 额外行动能否被用作行动，或者反之亦然？例如，一个诗人能否使用额外行动来给予一个诗人灵感骰子，然后用行动来施放治疗词？
entries.ENG_name: Can a bonus action be used as an action or vice versa? For example, can a bard use a bonus action to grant a Bardic Inspiration die and an action to cast healing word?
entries: No. Actions and bonus actions aren't interchangeable. In the example, the bard could use Bardic Inspiration or {@spell 治愈真言} on a turn, not both.

entries.name: 没有悬浮特性的飞行生物在空中时能否停留在同一个地方，还是每轮都需要移动？
entries.ENG_name: Can a flying creature without the hover trait stay in one place while airborne, or does it need to move each round?
entries: 一个没有悬浮特性的飞行生物可以在不进行移动的情况下每轮保持在空中。

entries.name: 你可以穿过一个倒地敌人的空间吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can you move through the space of a prone enemy?
entries: The {@condition 伏地} condition doesn't override the rule that prevents you from moving through an enemy's space, unless that enemy is at least two sizes larger or two sizes smaller than you.
如果你移动穿过另一个生物的空间——无论是友方还是敌方——那个空间对你来说就是{@quickref 困难地形||3}，并且你不能自愿地在那里结束你的移动。有关战斗中移动的更多信息，请参见《玩家手册》（{@i PHB}）中的"{@book 移动和位置|PHB|9|移动和位置}"。

entries.name: 旅行速度是否适用于战斗中的移动，还是仅适用于旅行时？
entries.ENG_name: Does travel pace apply to movement in combat, or just when traveling?
entries: 《玩家手册》中的旅行速度规则在战斗中不适用。

entries.name: 如果你有像狡猾行动或风行步伐这样的特性，你可以在你的回合中多次采取冲刺行动吗？
entries.ENG_name: If you have a feature like Cunning Action or Step of the Wind, can you take the Dash action more than once on your turn?
entries: If you can take the {@action 疾走} action as a bonus action, nothing in the rules prevents you from taking the {@action 疾走} action with your regular action too. The same principle holds when you use a feature like Action Surge; you could use both of your actions to take the {@action 疾走} action.

entries.name: 我的盗贼/巫师可以通过使用狡猾行动获得一个奖励动作来疾跑，我还可以对自己施放迅速撤退来获得一个奖励动作来疾跑。我能获得两个奖励动作来疾跑吗？
entries.ENG_name: My rogue/wizard can get a bonus action to Dash by using Cunning Action, and I can cast expeditious retreat on myself to get a bonus action to Dash. Do I get two bonus actions to Dash?
entries: 不。在你的回合中，你只能使用一个{@book 奖励动作|PHB|9|奖励动作}。如果你有两处或更多地方可以使用奖励动作，你必须选择在回合中使用哪一个（如果有的话）。

entries.name: 如果你使用帮助动作来分散敌人的注意力，你必须保持在它5英尺范围内才能使动作生效吗？
entries.ENG_name: If you use the Help action to distract a foe, do you have to stay within 5 feet of it for the action to work?
entries: 不，你可以先采取行动，然后移开。是行动本身赋予你的盟友优势，而不是你待在敌人旁边。

entries.name: 如果你处于隐形状态，当我射箭攻击目标时变得可见，再次隐藏是否需要采取行动？
entries.ENG_name: If I'm invisible and I become visible when I shoot an arrow at a target, does hiding again require an action?
entries: Without a special ability, hiding in combat requires the {@action 躲藏} action.

entries.name: 如果我使用准备动作对正在移动的某人造成伤害，我是否剥夺了目标的剩余移动能力？
entries.ENG_name: If I use the Ready action to deal damage to someone who's moving, do I deny the target the rest of its movement?
entries: 对移动目标造成伤害不会停止其移动，除非伤害伴随着停止移动的能力。像{@feat 哨兵}专长这样的能力可以赋予您这样的能力。将移动生物的生命值减少到0通常也是停止它的有效方法！

entries.name: 您能否使用准备动作在别人的回合上采取疾跑动作，然后将其与冲锋者专长结合起来？
entries.ENG_name: Can you use the Ready action to take the Dash action on someone else's turn and then combine the Charger feat with it?
entries: 不，因为你不能在别人的回合上采取奖励动作。

entries.name: 对于准备法术或其他动作，目标是否必须在范围内？
entries.ENG_name: For readying a spell or other action, does the target have to be in range?
entries: 当您采取准备动作时，目标必须在范围内，而不是在您最初准备时。

entries.name: 准备法术是如何工作的？如果触发条件从未出现，您会失去法术位吗？
entries.ENG_name: How does readying a spell work? Do you lose your spell slot if the trigger never occurs?
entries: 如果您在下一个回合开始前没有通过您的{@book 反应|PHB|9|反应}释放准备的法术，则会失去该法术位。

entries.name: 准备的动作是否可以在敌人的触发动作期间发生，比如在使用多重攻击时它的第一次和第二次攻击之间？
entries.ENG_name: Can a readied action occur during an enemy's triggering action, such as between its first and second attacks when it uses Multiattack?
entries: 准备的动作在触发条件满足后立即发生。如果您将触发条件定义为一次攻击，那么您的动作将在那次攻击之后发生。

entries.name: 我该如何知道在攻击检定及其伤害检定时使用哪个能力值修正值？
entries.ENG_name: How do I know which ability modifier to use with an attack roll and its damage roll?
entries: 《玩家手册》(PHB)指定了在攻击检定时使用哪个能力值修正值（《玩家手册》"{@book 攻击检定|PHB|9|攻击检定}"），以及在相应的伤害检定时使用哪一个（《玩家手册》"{@book 伤害检定|PHB|9|伤害检定}"）。以下是总结：
* 如果您使用的是您熟练的武器，请加上您的熟练加值。
** 加上您的熟练加值。您的施法能力由您的职业或赋予您进行法术攻击能力的任何特性决定。

For example, if you make a melee weapon attack with a longsword, you add your Strength modifier to the attack and damage rolls of the attack. In contrast, if you make the spell attack of the {@spell 火焰箭} cantrip, you add your spellcasting ability modifier to the attack roll. If you're a wizard, Intelligence is your spellcasting ability, so add your Intelligence modifier. {@spell 火焰箭} doesn't tell you to add your modifier to its damage roll, though, so you don't.

游戏中的各种特性对规则有明确的例外。例如，具有灵巧特性的武器允许您选择使用力量还是敏捷修正值。另一个例子：当您在《玩家手册》(PHB)中使用双武器战斗选项（《玩家手册》"{@book 双武器战斗|PHB|9|双武器战斗}"）时，除非该修正值是负数，否则您不会将能力值修正值加到奖励攻击的伤害上。然而，您仍然会将能力值修正值加到攻击检定上，因为该选项没有告诉您不要这样做。换句话说，您遵循一般规则，直到游戏中的某个例外告诉您不要这样做。

What about unusual cases like the {@spell 翠炎剑|TCE} spell? The spell, which appears in the {@book Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide|SCAG}, tells you to make a melee attack with a weapon. Look at the table above, and you see that, under normal circumstances, you use your Strength modifier when you make a melee weapon attack. It doesn't matter that a spell told you to attack. If a spell expects you to make a spell attack, the spell's description says so. For examples, take a look at {@spell 火焰箭} and {@spell 冷冻射线}. Both say it—"spell attack."

entries.name: "melee weapon attack"意味着使用近战武器进行的攻击，无论是武器的类型是近战还是远程，关键在于攻击方式是近战形式的。
entries.ENG_name: What does "melee weapon attack" mean: a melee attack with a weapon or an attack with a melee weapon?
entries: 它指的是使用武器进行的近战攻击。同样地，'远程武器攻击'指的是使用武器进行的远程攻击。即使没有武器参与，某些攻击也被视为近战或远程武器攻击，正如这些攻击的文本中所指定的。例如，徒手攻击被视为近战武器攻击，即使攻击者的身体不被认为是武器。
这里有一点措辞上的细微差别：如果我们的意思是用近战武器进行攻击，我们会写“近战武器攻击”（使用连字符）。

entries.name: 触及武器是如何与反击机会攻击协同作用的？
entries.ENG_name: How does a reach weapon work with opportunity attacks?
entries: {@book 反击机会攻击|PHB|9|反击机会攻击}通常在您可以看到的生物移动到您的触及范围之外时触发。如果您想使用触及武器进行反击机会攻击，例如使用镰刀或长戟，您可以在生物离开您用该武器拥有的触及范围时这样做。例如，如果您手持一把{@item 长戟|PHB}，一个正好在您旁边的生物可以移动5英尺而不会触发反击机会攻击。如果那个生物尝试再移动5英尺——超出您10英尺的触及范围——那么这个生物就会触发反击机会攻击。

entries.name: 一个被致盲的生物能进行反击机会攻击吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a blinded creature make an opportunity attack?
entries: An {@book opportunity attack|PHB|9|Opportunity Attacks} is triggered by "a hostile creature you can see". If you can't see an enemy, you can't make an opportunity attack against it. Creatures with {@sense 盲视} are an exception to this rule, because that ability lets those creatures "see" within a certain radius.

entries.name: 反击机会攻击可以用来进行擒抱或推搡吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can an opportunity attack be used to make a grapple or a shove?
entries: {@book Grappling|PHB|9|Grappling} and {@book shoving|PHB|9|Shoving a Creature} are special melee attacks that require the {@action 攻击} action. An {@book opportunity attack|PHB|9|Opportunity Attacks} is a special {@book reaction|PHB|9|Reactions}. Take the {@action 准备} action if you want to attempt a grapple or a shove as a reaction.

entries.name: 当你使用双武器战斗时，你能在你的回合抽武器并投掷两个武器吗？
entries.ENG_name: When you use two-weapon fighting, can you draw and throw two weapons on your turn?
entries: 您可以使用《玩家手册》中的双武器战斗规则投掷两种武器，但那条规则并没有赋予您免费拔出两种武器的能力。
在您的回合，您可以在移动或采取动作期间免费与一个物体互动，如《玩家手册》所述（“{@book 您的回合中的其他活动|PHB|9|Other Activity on Your Turn}”）。最常见的物体互动之一是拔出或收起武器。在同一回合与第二个物体互动需要一个动作。您需要像双持武器者专长这样的特性才能免费拔出或收起第二个武器。

entries.name: 使用双武器战斗时，我能否使用两次攻击（正常的和额外的）来推挤一个生物？
entries.ENG_name: With two-weapon fighting, can I use both attacks (normal and bonus) to shove a creature?
entries: 不。《玩家手册》中的双武器战斗规则（“{@book 双武器战斗|PHB|9|Two-Weapon Fighting}”）除非第一次攻击是使用轻型近战武器进行的，否则不会授予额外攻击。推搡一个生物是一种特殊的近战攻击，不涉及使用武器。

entries.name: 如果一个生物被摔跤，它是否仍然可以攻击并使用它的特殊能力？
entries.ENG_name: If a creature is grappled, can it still attack and use its special abilities?
entries: The {@condition 被擒} condition limits movement, not attacks, spellcasting, and the like. That said, many grappling abilities, such as a {@creature Roper||roper's} tendril attack, also deliver effects like the {@condition 束缚} condition.

entries.name: 《玩家手册》中的擒抱规则是否适用于没有手的生物？
entries.ENG_name: Is the grappling rule in the Player's Handbook usable by a handless creature?
entries: 《玩家手册》中的{@book 擒抱|PHB|9|擒抱}规则是为至少有一只手的擒抱者编写的，但地下城主(DM)可以很容易地为没有手但具有咬合能力或可以合理抓住某人的附属肢体（如触手）的无手生物调整规则。例如，一只{@creature 狼}可能会尝试用其咬合来抓住一个人，而只要它抓住那个人，它就无法使用其咬合攻击。

Keep in mind that the grappling rule in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} requires the {@action 攻击} action, so a creature must take that action—rather than Multiattack or another action in the creature's stat block—when it uses that rule. A monster, such as a {@creature roper}, that has a special grappling attack doesn't follow that rule when using its special attack.

entries.name: 摔跤或推挤是否会触发风暴先知的风暴之怒或战斗大师的反击？
entries.ENG_name: Does a grapple or a shove trigger the Tempest cleric's Wrath of the Storm or a Battle Master's Riposte?
entries: 两个问题的答案都是不。《玩家手册》中的{@book 擒抱|PHB|9|擒抱}和{@book 推搡生物|PHB|9|推搡生物}选项不会产生命中或未命中的结果。

entries.name: 假设我擒抱了你，然后我自己卧倒。我们现在是不是一起卧倒了？
entries.ENG_name: Say I grapple you, then I drop prone. Are we now prone together?
entries: No. A creature you're {@book grappling|PHB|9|Grappling} isn't knocked {@condition 伏地} if you become {@condition 伏地}. You're now holding onto the creature from a {@condition 伏地} position.

entries.name: 在近战范围内的目标是否获得某种掩护，或者我会受到不利影响？
entries.ENG_name: Target at range caught in melee combat—does that target get some kind of cover or do I get disadvantage?
entries: 如果另一生物位于您和目标之间，则目标具有一半掩蔽。

entries.name: 伤害能通过抗性或另一种伤害减免方式减少到0吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can damage be reduced to 0 by resistance or another form of damage reduction?
entries: 规则中没有伤害的最小值，所以攻击、法术或其他效果有可能造成0点伤害。

entries.name: 一条龙用呼吸武器攻击我。我成功通过豁免，并且我对伤害有抗性。我是否只受到四分之一的伤害？
entries.ENG_name: A dragon uses a breath weapon against me. I succeed on the save, and I have resistance to the damage. Do I take only one-quarter of the damage?
entries: 是的，因为抗性是在所有其他伤害修饰符之后应用的。如果您成功进行豁免并且仍然受到伤害，如果您具有正确的抗性，那么这个伤害会被减半。

entries.name: 意图是否仅为近战武器攻击可以使敌人昏迷，还是近战法术攻击也可以？
entries.ENG_name: Is the intent that only melee weapon attacks can knock foes unconscious, or can melee spell attacks as well?
entries: 如果你用近战攻击将一个生物的生命值降至0点，你可以使该生物昏迷。这种近战攻击不仅限于武器。即使是近战法术攻击也可以用来使生物昏迷。

entries.name: 使用网进行的攻击总是处于不利状态吗？
entries.ENG_name: Are attacks with a net always made with disadvantage?
entries: 除非您有特殊能力指出其他情况，否则任何《玩家手册》中的{@item 网|PHB}攻击都会处于不利状态，因为您要么《玩家手册》所述在目标5英尺以内进行远程攻击，要么您是在长距离攻击，对于{@item 网|PHB}而言，这是指5到15英尺之间。

entries.name: 非战斗大师可以尝试解除某人的武装吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can a non-Battle Master attempt to disarm someone?
entries: 卸除武装攻击机动是为战斗大师原型设计的，但任何人都可以尝试解除敌人的武装。《地下城主指南》中的卸除武装行动选项（"{@book 卸除武装|DMG|9|Disarm}"）提供了地下城主可能裁决这项活动的方式之一。

entries.name: 天然武器是否被视为武器？
entries.ENG_name: Are natural weapons considered weapons?
entries: 被规则指定为武器的物品，包括天然武器，确实是武器。相比之下，徒手攻击不是武器。它们是你用未武装的身体部位进行的动作。

entries.name: 我能用一把武器进行攻击，然后用另一只手持第二把武器并符合使用双武器战斗的条件吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can I make an attack with one weapon, then draw a second weapon with my other hand and qualify to use two-weapon fighting?
entries: To use the two-weapon fighting bonus action (PH, 195), you must have both weapons in hand when you make the first attack. If you're instead fighting with two or more weapons as part of the Extra {@action 攻击} feature, the rule for the two-weapon fighting bonus action doesn't apply. The rule for that bonus action applies only to itself, not to any other use of two or more weapons in the game.

entries.name: 施法
entries.ENG_name: Spellcasting

entries.name: 施法者能否对非目标施放法术以最小化对队伍成员的伤害，比如像碎裂术这样的法术？
entries.ENG_name: Can a spellcaster cast spells off-target to minimize damage to party members from a spell like shatter?
entries: The spellcaster chooses where to place the point of origin of a spell like {@spell 粉碎音波} and may, therefore, choose a position that is advantageous to allies.

entries.name: 永久性的魔法效果可以被解除吗？或者一旦成为永久性，它们就不再被视为魔法效果？
entries.ENG_name: Can permanent magical effects be dispelled? Or are they no longer considered magical effects once permanent?
entries: If the effect of a spell becomes permanent, it can be dispelled, unless its description says otherwise (such as in the {@spell 石墙术} spell).

entries.name: 施法者是否必须学习法术的仪式版本，除了普通版本之外，还是它们是相同的？
entries.ENG_name: Do spellcasters have to learn a ritual version of a spell apart from the normal version, or are they the same?
entries: 要施放你所知道的法术的仪式版本，你需要一个特性，如仪式施法，它赋予你将法术作为仪式施放的能力。你不需要另外学习法术的特殊版本。

entries.name: 施法者能否不在一次性准备完所有法术，而是在一天中的不同时间准备法术？
entries.ENG_name: Can spellcasters prepare spells not all at once, but prepare spells at various times in the day?
entries: 你只能在长时间休息的结束时准备你的法术列表。你不能在休息结束时准备一些法术，然后再晚些时候准备更多。

entries.name: 你是否总是知道当你受到法术效果影响时？
entries.ENG_name: Do you always know when you're under the effect of a spell?
entries: You're aware that a spell is affecting you if it has a perceptible effect or if its text says you're aware of it (see {@i PHB}, under "{@book Targets|PHB|10|Targets}"). Most spells are obvious. For example, {@spell 火球术} burns you, {@spell 治疗伤势} heals you, and {@spell 命令术} forces you to suddenly do something you didn't intend. Certain spells are more subtle, yet you become aware of the spell at a time specified in the spell's description. {@spell 魅惑人类} and {@spell 侦测思想} are examples of such spells.

Some spells are so subtle that you might not know you were ever under their effects. A prime example of that sort of spell is {@spell 暗示术}. Assuming you failed to notice the spellcaster casting the spell, you might simply remember the caster saying, "The treasure you're looking for isn't here. Go look for it in the room at the top of the next tower." You failed your saving throw, and off you went to the other tower, thinking it was your idea to go there. You and your companions might deduce that you were beguiled if evidence of the spell is found. It's ultimately up to the DM whether you discover the presence of inconspicuous spells. Discovery usually comes through the use of skills like {@skill 奥秘}, {@skill 调查}, {@skill 洞悉}, and {@skill 察觉} or through spells like {@spell 侦测魔法}.

entries.name: 如果我正在集中精神维持一个法术，然后我施放另一个需要集中的法术，我的第一个法术集中效果何时结束？
entries.ENG_name: If I'm concentrating on a spell and I cast another spell that requires concentration, when does my concentration on the first spell end?
entries: 如果您在集中精神施放一个法术，当您开始施放另一个需要集中精神的法术时，您对前一个法术的集中会立即结束。

entries.name: 法术攻击
entries.ENG_name: Spell Attacks

entries.name: 触击范围的法术是否被视为近战攻击，用于制服敌人而非杀死的目的？
entries.ENG_name: Is a touch range spell considered a melee attack for purposes of subduing foes rather than killing?
entries: 具有触碰范围并不意味着法术是近战攻击。法术会告诉你它是否进行这样的攻击。

entries.name: 法术攻击能否造成致命一击？
entries.ENG_name: Can spell attacks score critical hits?
entries: 法术攻击绝对可以造成致命一击。关于致命一击的规则适用于任何类型的攻击检定。

entries.name: 当施放影响多个目标的法术时，例如焰击射线或奥术冲击，我是发射一道射线或光束，确定结果，然后再发射吗？还是我必须在进行任何攻击检定之前选择所有目标？
entries.ENG_name: When casting a spell that affects multiple targets, such as scorching ray or eldritch blast, do I fire one ray or beam, determine the result, and fire again? Or do I have to choose all the targets before making any attack rolls?
entries: 尽管这些法术的持续时间是瞬间的，你选择目标并连续解决攻击，而不是一次性全部解决。如果你想，你可以在进行任何攻击之前宣布所有目标，但你仍然需要为每次攻击（和适当的伤害）单独掷骰。

entries.name: 具有攻击检定的法术能否用作攻击动作中的攻击或作为额外攻击特性的一部分？
entries.ENG_name: Can a spell with an attack roll be used as the attack in the Attack action or as part of the Extra Attack feature?
entries: 简短的答案是不行。

As explained in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}, you can take one action on your turn in combat, in addition to moving. You choose your action from the options available to everyone—options such as {@action 攻击}, {@action 施法}, and {@action 疾走}—or you choose from among the special actions you've gained from a class, a feat, or another source.

If you want to cast a spell on your turn, you take the {@action 施法} action. Doing so means you're not taking the {@action 攻击} action or any other action. It is true that a number of spells, such as {@spell 火焰箭} and {@spell 冷冻射线}, involve making an attack, but you can't make such an attack without first casting the spell that delivers it. In other words, just because something involves an attack doesn't mean the {@action 攻击} action is being used.

By extension, the Extra Attack feature (given by several classes, including the fighter and paladin) doesn't let you cast extra attack spells. That feature specifically relies on the {@action 攻击} action, not the {@action 施法} action or any other action.
总结来说，要进行法术攻击，你必须首先施放一个法术或使用一个创造法术效果的特性。像额外攻击这样的游戏特性，可以让你进行攻击，除非它明确说明可以，否则不会让你施放法术。

entries.name: 您能否使用近战法术攻击来进行反击机会攻击？
entries.ENG_name: Can you use a melee spell attack to make an opportunity attack?
entries: You can't if the spell attack is created by casting a spell. When a creature triggers an opportunity attack from you, you can use your {@book reaction|PHB|9|Reactions} to make a melee attack against it. The opportunity attack doesn't suddenly give you the ability to cast a spell, such as {@spell 电爪}.
每个法术都有一个施法时间。像机会攻击这样的游戏特性，并不能让你绕过那个施法时间，除非该特性另有说明。例如，{@feat 战争施法者}特性就是一个能让你在进行机会攻击时代替它施放一个法术，从而绕过1个动作施法时间的特性。
一些怪物可以使用近战法术攻击进行反击机会攻击。以下是具体方式：某些怪物——包括{@creature 女妖}、{@creature 巫妖}和{@creature 幽灵}——拥有不是通过法术施展的近战法术攻击。例如，女妖的腐蚀之触动作是一种近战法术攻击，但不需要施放法术来执行它。因此，女妖可以使用腐蚀之触进行反击机会攻击。

entries.name: 一些法术（如奥术飞弹）以生物为目标。还有一些（如火球术）也可以以物体为目标。这是否意味着我不能用奥术飞弹攻击门？
entries.ENG_name: Some spells (like eldritch blast ) target a creature. Some others (like fire bolt ) target objects too. Does this mean that I can't attack the door with eldritch blast?
entries: 法术中的目标指定（生物、物体或其他东西）是有意为之的。

entries.name: 近战法术攻击是否算作触及死亡特性的近战攻击？
entries.ENG_name: Does a melee spell attack count as a melee attack for Touch of Death?
entries: 近战法术攻击确实是一种近战攻击，确实符合死亡牧师的死亡之触特性。

entries.name: 法术环阶
entries.ENG_name: Spell Level

entries.name: 如果您不使用法术位施放法术，它的等级是多少？
entries.ENG_name: What level is a spell if you cast it without a spell slot?
entries: 这样的法术会以其最低可能的等级施放，即出现在其描述顶部附近的等级。除非您有特殊能力指出其他情况，否则提高法术等级的唯一方法是在施放时消耗一个更高等级的法术位。
这里有一些例子：

items: The warlock's Chains of Carceri feature lets a warlock cast {@spell 怪物定身术} without using a spell slot. That casting of {@spell 怪物定身术} is, therefore, 5th level, which is the lowest possible level for that spell.
The warlock's Thief of Five Fates feature lets a warlock cast {@spell 灾祸术} using a spell slot, which means the spell is 1st level or higher, depending on the slot that the warlock expends to cast it.
武僧的元素之徒特性允许武僧消耗气点，而不是法术位，来提升法术的等级。

entries: 这条规则对玩家角色和怪物都适用，这就是为什么《怪物手册》中的天生施法者必须以其可能的最低等级施放天生法术。

entries.name: 施法时间
entries.ENG_name: Casting Time

entries.name: 您在您的回合上施放的法术数量有限制吗？
entries.ENG_name: Is there a limit on the number of spells you can cast on your turn?
entries: 没有规则说你在自己的回合内只能施放X个法术，但是有一些实际的限制。主要的限制因素是你的行动。大多数法术需要一个行动来施放，除非你使用像战士的动作激增（Action Surge）这样的特性，否则你在回合中只有一个行动。

If you cast a spell, such as {@spell 治愈真言}, with a bonus action, you can cast another spell with your action, but that other spell must be a cantrip. Keep in mind that this particular limit is specific to spells that use a bonus action. For instance, if you cast a second spell using Action Surge, you aren't limited to casting a cantrip with it.

entries.name: 施放奖励动作法术的规则是否适用于当你采取由法术授予的奖励动作时？
entries.ENG_name: Does the rule on casting a bonus action spell apply when you take a bonus action granted by a spell?
entries: The rule on {@book casting a spell as a bonus action|PHB|10|Bonus Action} applies only on the turn you cast the spell. For example, {@spell 灵体武器} can be cast as a bonus action, and it lasts for 1 minute. On the turn you cast it, you can't cast another spell before or after it, unless that spell is a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action. Until {@spell 灵体武器} ends, it gives you the option of controlling its spectral weapon as a bonus action. That bonus action does not involve casting a spell, despite the fact that it's granted by a spell, so you can control the weapon and cast whatever spell you like on the same turn.

entries.name: 你能在你的回合施放需要反应的动作来施放的法术吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can you cast a reaction spell on your turn?
entries: You sure can! Here's a common way for it to happen: Cornelius the wizard is casting {@spell 火球术} on his turn, and his foe casts {@spell 反制法术} on him. Cornelius also has {@spell 反制法术} prepared, so he uses his {@book reaction|PHB|9|Reactions} to cast it and break his foe's {@spell 反制法术} before it can stop {@spell 火球术}.

entries.name: 如果法术通常不需要集中精神，作为仪式施放法术是否需要集中精神？
entries.ENG_name: Does casting a spell as a ritual require concentration if the spell doesn't normally require it?
entries: 在施放任何法术时，包括仪式版本，如果施放时间超过1个动作，则需要{@book 集中精神|PHB|10|Concentration}。一旦施放完成，只有当法术的持续时间说明中指出需要时，法术才需要集中精神。

entries.name: 法术成分
entries.ENG_name: Components

entries.name: 法术是否消耗其材料成分？
entries.ENG_name: Does a spell consume its material components?
entries: A spell doesn't consume its material components unless its description says it does. For example, the pearl required by the {@spell 鉴定术} spell isn't consumed, whereas the diamond required by {@spell 唤醒死者} is used up when you cast the spell.

entries.name: 如果法术的材料组件被消耗了，法术施法焦点是否仍可用来替代被消耗的组件？
entries.ENG_name: If a spell's material components are consumed, can a spellcasting focus still be used in place of the consumed component?
entries: 不。只有在法术描述中没有注明材料成分的费用，并且该成分不会被消耗的情况下，法术施法焦点才能用来代替材料成分。

entries.name: 使用法术施法焦点需要多少交互？它是否必须包含在姿势成分中？
entries.ENG_name: What's the amount of interaction needed to use a spellcasting focus? Does it have to be included in the somatic component?
entries: 如果一个法术有材料成分，你在施放法术时需要处理那个{@book 成分|PHB|10|Components}。如果你使用施法焦点作为材料成分，同样的规则适用。

If a spell has a somatic component, you can use the hand that performs the somatic component to also handle the material component. For example, a wizard who uses an {@item orb|PHB} as a spellcasting focus could hold a {@item quarterstaff|PHB} in one hand and the orb in the other, and he could cast {@spell 闪电束} by using the orb as the spell's material component and the orb hand to perform the spell's somatic component.

Another example: a cleric's {@item holy symbol|PHB} is emblazoned on her {@item shield|PHB}. She likes to wade into melee combat with a {@item mace|PHB} in one hand and a shield in the other. She uses the holy symbol as her spellcasting focus, so she needs to have the shield in hand when she casts a cleric spell that has a material component. If the spell, such as {@spell 援助术}, also has a somatic component, she can perform that component with the shield hand and keep holding the mace in the other.

If the same cleric casts {@spell 治疗伤势}, she needs to put the {@item mace|PHB} or the {@item shield|PHB} away, because that spell doesn't have a material component but does have a somatic component. She's going to need a free hand to make the spell's gestures. If she had the {@feat War Caster} feat, she could ignore this restriction.

entries.name: 持续时间
entries.ENG_name: Duration

entries.name: 如果您在集中精神施放一个法术，您是否需要保持与法术目标或法术效果的视线联系？
entries.ENG_name: If you're concentrating on a spell, do you need to maintain line of sight with the spell's target or the spell's effect?
entries: 您不需要保持视线或在范围内来维持法术的{@book 集中精神|PHB|10|Concentration}，除非法术的描述或其他游戏特性另有说明。

entries.name: 如果我有10点临时生命值，并且在集中精神施放法术时受到攻击造成30点伤害，那么保持集中的体质豁免的难度等级是多少？
entries.ENG_name: If I have 10 temporary hit points and I take 30 damage from an attack while concentrating on a spell, what is the DC of the Constitution save to maintain my concentration?
entries: 在那种情况下，难度等级是15。当临时生命值为你吸收伤害时，你仍然在受到伤害，只是没有影响到你的真实生命值。
相比之下，像巫师的奥术守卫这样的特性可以为你承受伤害，可能消除了进行体质豁免投掷的需要，或者至少降低了那个豁免的难度等级。

entries.name: 施法者在施放法术后能否解散该法术？
entries.ENG_name: Can a spellcaster dismiss a spell after casting it?
entries: You can't normally dismiss a spell that you cast unless (a) its description says you can or (b) it requires {@book concentration|PHB|10|Concentration} and you decide to end your concentration on it. Otherwise, a spell's magic is unleashed on the environment, and if you want to end it, you need to cast {@spell 解除魔法} on it.

entries.name: 特定法术
entries.ENG_name: Specific Spells

entries.name: 我能否对一个类人形态的不死生物尸体，比如僵尸或幽灵，施放活化死尸？
entries.ENG_name: Can I cast animate dead on the humanoid-shaped corpse of an undead creature such as a zombie or a ghast?
entries: When {@spell 活化死尸} targets a corpse, the body must have belonged to a creature of the humanoid creature type. If the spell targets a pile of bones, there is no creature type restriction; the bones become a skeleton.

entries.name: 在时间停止法术期间施放活化物体会结束时间停止吗？
entries.ENG_name: Does casting animate objects during a time stop spell end the time stop?
entries: 不。然而，在时间停止期间使用额外行动来指挥新创造的生物确实会结束时间停止。

entries.name: 你能否通过获得更多的临时生命值来延长阿迦瑟的护甲的持续时间？
entries.ENG_name: Can you extend the duration of armor of Agathys by gaining more temporary hit points?
entries: 这个法术的目的是仅在你拥有法术授予的临时生命值时有效。当这些临时生命值耗尽时，法术就结束了。

Keep in mind that temporary hit points aren't cumulative. If you have temporary hit points and receive more of them, you don't add them together, unless a game feature says you can. You decide which temporary hit points to keep. As an example, let's say you're a warlock with the Dark One's Blessing feature, which gives you temporary hit points when you reduce a creature to 0 hit points. You currently have 2 temporary hit points remaining from {@spell Armor of Agathys||armor of Agathys}, you just slew a monster, and your Dark One's Blessing can now give you 4 temporary hit points. If you take those temporary hit points, they replace the ones from {@spell 艾嘉西斯之铠} and end that spell, so you might not want to take them and keep the spell going instead, so as to continue benefiting from the cold damage it delivers.

entries.name: 树皮术如何与盾牌、掩护以及其他对护甲等级（AC）的修正共同作用？
entries.ENG_name: How does barkskin work with shields, cover, and other modifiers to AC?
entries: {@spell 树肤术} specifies that your AC can't be lower than 16 while you are affected by the spell. This means you effectively ignore any modifiers to your AC—including your Dexterity modifier, your armor, a shield, and cover—unless your AC is higher than 16. For example, if your AC is normally 14, it's 16 while {@spell 树肤术} is on you. If your AC is normally 15 and you have half cover, your AC is 17; {@spell 树肤术} isn't relevant in this case.

entries.name: 致盲猛击法术是否在我集中精神维持该法术期间，每次成功的攻击都造成额外的辐射伤害，还是仅在第一次攻击时？
entries.ENG_name: Does the blinding smite spell deal extra radiant damage on every successful attack I make while I'm concentrating on the spell, or only on the first one?
entries: 法术描述中的"下一次"表明额外伤害只适用于一次，即在你完成施法后第一次击中生物时。

entries.name: 寒触法术是否旨在作为阻止任何具有再生能力的生物的方式？
entries.ENG_name: Is the chill touch spell intended as a way of foiling any creature that has Regeneration?
entries: {@spell 寒颤之触} does, indeed, stop the target it hits from regaining hit points until the spell ends. This is true even if the target takes none of the necrotic damage, whether because of immunity or some other reason.

entries.name: 使用5英尺的正方形，刀刃云雾是否影响一个单一的方格？
entries.ENG_name: Using 5-foot squares, does cloud of daggers affect a single square?
entries: {@spell 匕首之云} (5 ft. cube) can affect more than one square on a grid, unless the DM says effects snap to the grid. There are many ways to position that cube.

entries.name: 处于被迫决斗效果下的生物能否传送到距离施法者30英尺以上的地方？
entries.ENG_name: Can a creature under the effect of compelled duel teleport more than 30 feet away from the caster?
entries: 不。你不能以任何方式远离被迫决斗的施法者超过30英尺，包括通过传送。

entries.name: 由召唤动物召唤出的野兽造成的伤害是否算作魔法伤害？
entries.ENG_name: Is the damage dealt by a beast from conjure animals considered magical?
entries: 召唤生物的属性框决定了生物伤害的性质，除非法术另有说明。

entries.name: 召唤动物能否召唤一群生物？
entries.ENG_name: Can conjure animals summon a swarm?
entries: 不。召唤动物法术召唤的是单个生物，而群体是由多个生物组成的。

entries.name: 当你施放像召唤林地生物这样的法术时，是由施法者还是DM选择被召唤的生物？
entries.ENG_name: When you cast a spell like conjure woodland beings, does the spellcaster or the DM choose the creatures that are conjured?
entries: A number of spells in the game let you summon creatures. {@spell 召唤动物}, {@spell 召唤天界生物}, {@spell 召唤次级元素生物}, and {@spell 召唤林地之精} are just a few examples.
Some spells of this sort specify that the spellcaster chooses the creature conjured. For example, {@spell 寻获魔宠} gives the caster a list of animals to choose from.
Other spells of this sort let the spellcaster choose from among several broad options. For example, {@spell 召唤次级元素生物} offers four options. Here are the first two:

items: 一个挑战等级为2或更低的元素生物
两个挑战等级为1或更低的元素生物

entries: 对于这些选项的设计意图是，施法者选择其中之一，然后由DM决定符合所选选项的生物。例如，如果你选择了第二个选项，DM将选择两个挑战等级为1或更低的元素生物。
施法者当然可以表达他们希望出现什么生物的偏好，但是否如此取决于DM。DM通常会选择适合战役的生物，并且会在场景中引入那些会有趣的生物。

entries.name: 反制法术是针对施法者还是你试图反制的法术？
entries.ENG_name: Does counterspell target the caster or the spell you're trying to counter?
entries: 反制法术的目标是另一位施法者。

entries.name: 如果一个使用抗不死伤害特性的巫师花费生命骰来提升由创造同源体法术创造的同源体的生命值上限，这是否仍然会减少巫师的生命值上限？
entries.ENG_name: If a wizard with Inured to Undeath spends Hit Dice to raise the hit point maximum of a homunculus created by the create homunculus spell, does it still decrease the wizard's hit point maximum?
entries: 花费生命骰对同源体的影响如法术所述，但巫师的生命值上限不会减少。

entries.name: 你可以使用更高等级的法术位来施放黑暗术，以结束一个3级或更高等级创造光源的法术吗？
entries.ENG_name: Can you cast darkness with a higher-level slot to end a spell of 3rd level or higher that creates light?
